bo ste/ chos nyung dus yang dgag par grol thar la/ gzhan dog pa 'dri ba ma mchis par bgyi na/ sangs rgyas kyis byams shing sdugs rjes gatrags taM/ bdag la bkrol bshad par
smonano// sangs rgyas kyis/ phal mang bo la bka' stsal pa// byang chub sems dpa 'chos kyi rgyal po 'dis bskal pa brgya stong khri 'bum gyi sang sargyas rnams la yon gsalamyong zin pas na/
thabs spyod pa mkhas te/ sems can la ra mda' bya zhing bsgral nus so// byang chub sems dang/ 'a 'diri brodirlung spyad de/ sems can rnams srog 'khrud nus sa// khyodal sogs pa da lta
ba'i dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sems can rnams kyis khyung chub sems dpa' 'din mang gzungs su bzung gi stod du/ dge ba bshes gnyen chen po gyis/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i shas/
cha rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa'i steng dar shar pa thogs pa med pa thob bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal pos sa la gtugs te/ phyag 'tshal nas langs te/ du' gzhi nas mya ngan las
'das pa chen por zhugs nas/ stong par la zar pa go ste/ chags pa med pa'i sa las rkang pa bteg pa dang/ rkang pa bor ba kun kyang gtsang gdang da bgrod de thal mo sbyar nas/
sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal te song ngo/ dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal pa'i mdo rdzogs so/// sngon rgya las 'gyur ba'iri'i ra skad gsar gyis ma bcos par snang/
bod skad du/ 'phags pa legs nyes kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu bstan pa zhes bya ba theg bachen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thoms cad la phyag
'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshol mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshibcom
ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa dang/ lha dang mi'i 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor cing/ sems rtse gcig tu chos nyan pa dag la chos ston par mdzad do// de nas tshe dang
ldan pa kun dga' bos sems can rnams kyi ched du/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das daltar 'jig rtenan rnam pa ba gcig tu mare skyes pa mtshungs pa la//
kha cig na sdug cing/ kha cig na byad bzhin mi sdug pa dang/ kha cig dpa' zhing/ khage ni zhan pa dang/ kha cig ni dbu la zhing/ kha cig ni phyug pa dang/ kha ci gnas dug bsngal zhing
kha cig ni bod kha dang ldan pa dang/ kha cig ni mi rabs su gyur cing/ kha cig ni ma rabs su gyur te sgra dbyangs mi mtshungs shing/ skadi tha dad par gyur pa dang/ kha cig ni
'bargyar lenakyang 'chi bar mi 'gyur la/ kha cig na lo sum cu lan nas sngar 'gus pa dang/ khacig na lo bco lnga lononas glo bur du 'chi ba dang/ kha cig ni
ma'i mngal nyid du 'gam pa dang/ cig na byad bzhin sdug cing mdzes pa rung/ kha cig ni dbul zhing marabs su gyural khyad bzhin mi sdug pa dang/ kha cigani phyug cing ya rabs su skye
bdang/ kha cig ni dpa' nang dman par gyur la/ kha tsa/ ni zhan cing rigs mthon por skyes pa dang/ kha cig sdug bsngal zhing tsherang ba/ kha cig na bad ni nga tsho thung ba dang/ khacig
nA dege ba spyad kyang/ nongs skyon dang bcas par 'gyur la/ khacagan snyag pa brgyas kyad bsad nams kyi phan yon thob pa dang/ kha cigana'atsho zhing dkar yang mgo ya yar gyur cing
ma gsal lo/ kha cig ni sngo zhingeganag kyang mngag bya da ring ldan pa dang/ kha cig bzhi bo su yang sems rtsal dang ldan pa dang/ kha cig ring zhing bong che yang la zhan dag gi g.yog bgyid pa//
dang/ kha cig ni bu tsha ma la// kha cig na re cig lu gnas pa dang/ kha cigan slad rol du rgyu zhing bkres pa dang grang ba dag gis nyen par 'gyur 1 khacig na khyim n gnas kyang gos/
zas dag la dga' 'byor pa dang/ kha cig ni le gzhon patshodabul zhing 'a khongs la/ rgas pa'itshog dod phyug por 'gyuralo dang/ khacin yusam mchis bzhin du yang/ nongs pa/
0 ma mchis par nan gyis go rar stsal ba dang/ khacig de na ang snyape rdza dang ldan pa// bu chung su zhu che zhing mdo sde dang gtsug lag gi don gleng bar bgyid la// kha cig na ro nu su/
sar phye nas 'thab cing rtsod par bgyud pa dang/ khacagan khang khyim dag brtsigs nas 'byorar sna tshogs dang ldan la/ khacag na de khong khyim m mchis pas gzhan dag la rten pa dang/

kha cig ni bya 'dab chags bzhin du share dang thang la gnas pa dang/ kha ci'iganagacan gzan gyi rnam pa dang mtshungs ngashing spu'agos dang ldan pa khras su rtswa 'tshal zhing khral 'byung ba dang/ kha ngule ga ni yo be
ma 'tshal ba dang/ khacigan co yongam bgyis par bden par rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur la/ kha cig ni sla bar bgyid pa'i gnas kyang marAd pa dang/ kha cig ni dbang po gsal bas
shes pa dang ldan pa// kha cigen redang po malegasal bas shes pa dang mi ldan pa dang/ khagan tsal na gdod thob par 'gyur la/ khacig ni ma btsal bar yang red par 'gyur ba dang/ kha
cige na phyog kyang ser snache la/ kha cig ni dbul por gyur kyang gtong pa la dga' ba dang/ kha ca na tshig smras ra rnams mnyin 'di des la/ kha cigan tshogo smas pa rnams btum zhing brlung
ba dang/ kha cigeg na med pa kun gyis bkur zhing snying du sdug par 'gyur la/ khaciganamang po kun gyis thag ring du slong bar bgyid pa dang/ kha cig ni byams pa'i sems kyis
srog chags ga bar bgyid la// khacis na srog chags dpag tu ma mchis pa dag gsod par bgyid pa dang/ kha cig ni yangs pa mang po kun gyis yade du mchis
par 'gyur la[7 ]kha cig ni gzhan dag gis spong bar brgyad pa dang/ kha cig ni chung ma dang gyos skyag la sogs pas snang bar 'gyural// kha cig ni gnyen bshes kun dga' bar 'gyur
ba dang/ kha cig ni chos kyi tshig mnyan par dga' ba dang/ kha cig ni mdo sde zos nas gnyid 'gabgyid pa dang/ kha cig ni dpa' zhing rtsal dang ldan lung zhe sa ma mchis la/ kha
cig ni tsho ga 'bru dang don dag la slob par mas pa dang/ kha cig ni dud 'gro'i dbyibs tha dad pa sna tshogs bgyis pa dag gda' na/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 'bras bu gang lags
pa rgya cher bkas bshad du gsol// 'khor mang pa rnams kyis thos shing rtogs par 'gyural/ sems rtse gcig tu dge ba la gzhol bar 'gyur ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pA/ kun dga' bo khyed kyis ji skadu dris pa de de bzhin// rnam par smon pa myong bar mi mtshungs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ni/ tshe rabs snga ma dag la sems can
spyod pa mi mnyam pa'i dbang bgyis na/ tha dad pa ci brag khargya stodanang pa myong bar gyurd yin to/ tsha'adi'i byad bzhin sdug pa la/nga yone pa de ni/ bzod pa dang du blangs pa las
03 'ongs pa yin no// byad ma sdu ba pa gang yin pa ni/ khong khro ba las 'ongs pa yin no// mir gyur kyang dbul por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ ser sna byas pa las 'ongs
pa yin no// mar gyur kyang phyug por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ sbyin pa btang ba las 'ongs pa yin no// ya rabs mthon por gyur pa gang yin r de na/ gzhan dag la gus da/ra
phyag byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no// mi rabs su gyur pa gang yin pa da na/ nga rgyal byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no// mi'i gyurakyang lus rang zhing bong chab gang yin pa de ni/ gus pas
bkur sti byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no// lus thung ngu gang yin pa de na/ chos la bar s pa las 'ongs pa yin no// mir gyur kyang bka' blo mi bde ba gang yin pa de ni/ sngon lug
byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no// mar gyur kyang lo nag cing ring ba gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snang ba bsgribs pa las 'ongs pa yin no// maregyur byang mchu mi sdug
pa gang yin pa de ni// mchod rten gyi zas myongs pa las 'ongs pa yin no// mir gyur kyang mig dmar ba gang yin par ni/ me'i ser sna byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no// mir gyur
kyang mig mi gsal ba gang yin pa de ni/ khra'i mig brus pa las 'ongs pa yin no// mar gyurakyang lkugs pa gang yin pa da ni/ chos skur pa btab pa las 'ongs pa yin no// mir
0 @#// gyur kyang 'on pa gang an pa de ni/ chos thos par mi dga' ba las 'ongs pa yin no// mar gyur kyang so rnon por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ nya'i rus pa
[1 ]'cha' zhing sha zla bar mngon par dgar ba las 'ongs pa yin no// mir gyur kyang sna dgye bor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ drom zhom pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas ra/
las 'ongs pa yin no// mir gyur kyang mchu shor gyur pa gang yin pa dano/ nya'i 'gram pa phug pa dag las gyur pa yin no// ma gyur kyang sgra sar par gyur pa gang yin pa da na//
[$ ]zhag gi spu btogs pa las 'ongs pa yin no// mar gyur kyang rna bar l ba gang yane pa den/ gzhan dag gi rna ba phug pa las gyur pa yin no// mir gyur kyang lus kyi desha brur lta bur gyur pa//
gang yin pa de ni/ gos yang zhing srab pa dag bgos nas/ da nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa las gyur pa yin no// mar gyur kyang mdog gnag pa gang
yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs khyams dag gi 'og tu bzhag nas dud pas bdug pa las gyur pa yin no// mir gyur kyang rkang lag zha bor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ ]
mkhan po dang bla ma rnams mthong yang ldang ba med pa las gyur pa yin no// mir gyur kyang sgyur por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ gos yong zhing srab pa dag bgos nas/ phan tshun du 'ge
0 ba'i tshe/ deng zhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la rgyab kyis phyogs pa las gyur pa yin no// mir gyur kyang dpral ba mi sdug pa gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong
ba'i tshe phyag kyang ma byed l/ lag pas dpral bar gdabs pa las gyur pa yonAno// mar gyur kyang gnya' ba byung ba gang u0f00na pa de ni/ bla ma dag mthong nas mgo smras te bros
nas 'byol ba las gyur pa yon no// mar gyur byung rtag par snang na ba gang yin pa dani/ sems can gyi lus tsho yan lag bcad cing gtubs pa las gyur pa yAn no// mar gyur
kyang mdzo can du gyur pa gang yin pa da ni/ nyes pa med par gzhan dgag nor blangs pa las gyur pa yin no// mar gyur kyang dbugs thung ba gang yin pa de ni/ dgun grang ba'i dus kyi tshe
gzhan dag la zas grang mo dag byon pa las gyur pa yin no// mar gyur kyang bu khye'u dang bu mo mid par gyur pa gang yin pa re ni/ bya mong pa dag gi phrug bsad pa las gyur pa yin no/
mar gyur nas bu maMmang ba gang yin pa de ni/ sems can gs b.ro dga' bo las 'ongs pa yin no// mir gyur kyang tshar ng ba gang yin pa de ni/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa las/
'ongs pa yin no// mar gyur nas tshe thung ba gang yin pa reni/ srog chags mang rab sadapa las gyurapa inano// mir gyur nas phyug por gyur pa gang man pa dan/ sbyin pa btang ba las
gyur pa yin no// mar gyur nas rta dang shing rta dang ldan pa gang yin pa don/ dkon mchog gsum la ltadangashing rtaphul ba las gyur pa yin no// ma gyur nas dbang lags
ba gang yin pa da ni/ modo sgra 'dri zhing khaton 'don pa las gyur pa yin no// mir gyur kyang dad dam gsal ba gang yin pa de ni/ dud spro'i gnas nas 'ong pa yun ni/ mar gyur kyang
gnanagyi bran dang branam byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ bu lon chags pa las 'ongs pa yin no// maregyur kyang ma brtan zhing yangs pa gang yinir den/ sngon gyi spre'u byas pa las 'ongs da
yin no// mir gyur kyang mdzend kyis btab pa gang yanipa don/ dkon mchogagasum rnam par bashig pa las gyur pa/mnano// mir gyur kyang rkang lag 'jas 'gros su gyur pa gang/
yin pa de ni/ sems can gyi rkang lag dam du bcings pa las 'ongs pa yin no// mir gyur kyang lus la rma dngashu ba 'byung zhing yun ring por sman dang dpyad byas kyang sos su ma btub
pa gang yin pa de ni/ sems can la brtag khratsog byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no// mir gyur kyang rang bzhin ma bsun pa gang yin pa de na/ sdig sprul byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/ gir
gyur kyang dbang po drug tshang ba gang yin pa de na/ tshul khrims bsrungs pa las 'ongs pa yin no// mir gyur kyang dbang po rnams mtshang pa gang yin bi de na/ tshul khrims 'chal pa las 'os
0 ba yin no ma gyur kyang gtsang sbra med pa gang yin pa de ni/ phagabyas pa las 'ongs pa yin no ma'i myuranasaglagar la dga' ba gang zhe pa ra na/ rol mo mkhanabyas pa las
'ongs pa yonen// mir gyur kyang 'dod chen pa gang yin pa da ni/ khyi byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no// mar gyur kyang gzhi'i bar lba ba yod pa gang yin pa dran/ gcig pu brnogs pa las
'ongs pa yin no// mar gyur nas kha'i dri mnam pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshig ngan gyis gzhan la spyos pa las 'ongs lo yin no/ mar gyurakyang mtshan dang maldan pa gang yin pa don/ khyi dang
pa rnams kyi rgyag pa bcad pa las gyur pa yin no// mir gyur nas lce thung ba gang yin pa ra na/ dben pa dag tu bla ma rtag latshig mi snyan pa brjod pa las 'ongs pa yin no// mir gyur kyang
gzhan gyi chung ma la g.yem par mngon par dga' ba re ni/ shi 'phos nas byang ba dgatu ltung bar 'gyur ro// ma gyur kyang bdag dang nya zhing gnyen du 'brel brtag la g.yem par mngon
par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni/ sha 'dosanas khye'u mchil pa dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ro/ mir gyur nas mdo sta dang bstan bcos dag laser sna byed cing shes pa sbas nas gzhan dag la mi
ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ shi 'phos nas shing srin dag tu skye bar 'gyur// mir gyur nas mda' gzhuthogs shing gazhom pa la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa dan/ shi 'phosanas klalo
can du ltung bar 'gyur ro// rngon pa byed cing srog chags gsod pa la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa re ni/ shi 'phos nas 'phar spung dag tu ltung bar 'gyur
ro/ (mgo rgyan dang me tog thogs pa la mngon r/ra dga' ba gang yin pa de ni/ shi 'phos nas ga ni rtag gi srin bu byed par 'gyur ro// gas ring po gyonapar dga' po dan/ b+ha/
'phos nas sran du mjug rangesabyed par 'gyur ro// nyal zhing za bar mngon par dga' bad na/ shi les nas phag tu skyobar 'gyur ro// gas tshon can gyonal la mngon par dga' ba gang
kyi yin pa de ni/ shi 'phos nas bye'u khra'u byed par 'gyur ro// gzhan gyi tshogi zlos shing kurabyed par mngon par dga' ba do ni/ shi 'phos nas byan tso byed par 'gyur ro// phramakhyed pa la
mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni/ shi 'phos nas sbrul lus po cha dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// nyes bamed par dgra la rnam par 'atsho ba gang yin pa de ni/ shi 'phosanas srane bu lon du
'dzin pa'isims dang bcas pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// gzhan gyi dbyen byed par dga' ba gang yanipa de ni/ sha 'as nas nicudag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// dmar ma'i tshog smra ba la/
mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de na/ shi 'phos nas wo dag tu skyedar 'gyur ro// gzhan dag skyed cing mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni/ sha 'o sanas ri del/sa sha ba rags
02 su skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe snga ma la shing gi lcam gnanas gtsang khang du zhugs pa gang yin pa dun/ tshe 'di la rta'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe stsam phyin gtong ba la mngon
par dga' bgang yin pa de ni/ srin gnam po'arigs su skye bar 'gyur sro/ tshe snga ma la dge 'dunagyi le gtun dang rang brag longs su spyod pa gang yane pa ra nI/ tshe 'di la srog chags
srin bu mgo rdebs pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur sro/ tshesnga ma la gzhan dag ga zos kyi gegs byas na/ tshe 'di la shing sran byed par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun gyi rkub rkus nas yongs su spyad
pa gang yin pa dran/ tshe 'di la ta dang chu srin drug tu skye bar 'gyur ro// dge 'dun gyi sa gzhi dag la ma gtsud pa 'dor ba gang yin pa re ni/ bshang gci'i nong du srin bu dag tu skye bar 'gyuri'o
dge 'dun gyi shing thog brkus pa gang yin pa da na/ 'jim rdza ba za ba'i sngon du byed par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun gyi dekor brkus pa gang yin pa da ni/ rang thag 'dri pa'i gling dang [“]gong
bu byed par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun gyi de kor la nan gyis slang zhing sngaskyon byed na phug ron dkar pa byed par 'gyur// dge 'dun la 'phya zhing smod par byed na glangag nya'aga' son tuduskye bar
'gyur ro// dge 'dun gyi tshod lhum zos na tshod ma'i srin bur skye bar 'gyur ro// dge 'dun gyi khri stan la 'dug n sa'i srin bu mjug ranges su skye bar 'gyur ro// dge 'dun gyi yo byad sna
tshogs dag la dgongs su spyod par byed na phye ma leb tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ rus pa dag thogs nas gtsug lag khang du 'jug par byed na bya mchu rings su skye bar 'gyur ro//
dmar chu dung dkar tshi dgamachu la brkus nas gtsug lag khang du 'ojug par byed n byamatshu dmar dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// gos tshon can ba gos togatsug lag khang du 'grobar byed na bu kha dog ser
bo dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ khyoshug gtsug lag khang du gnas nas nyal pa byas na khyam ge sngon dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhinagshegs pa'i mchod rten la brdzasen rdza ma'i lus bye dpar
'gyur ro// lham bgos te de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri gtsang khang du 'gro bar byed na/ sbal par skye bar 'gyur ro// chos nyan pa'i tsho klag cor zeran ni bya lce brgya pa dag tu skyabar 'gyur ro//
dge slong ma gtsang ma sun par byed na/ sha 'phos nas sems can dmyal ba'i gnas lcags kyi brag phug tu ltung zhing/ ral gri'i 'khor lo brgya stong du ma gcig tu babs nas lus gcod par
rgyu'agyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'dasal// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs pa ltar dge 'dun gyi rjes yongs su spyod pa gang la
pa de gal yang g par shin tu lci ba zhig lags par gyur na/ sbyin bdag bzhi po ji ltar gtsug lag khang du mtsho zhing bkur sti reng/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das/
la kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang du 'gro ba la sems rnam pa gnyis yod de/ dge ba'i sems dang/ a dege sems gang yin pa'o// dge ba'i sems zhes bya ba
na jilta bu zhan/ gang gas gtsug lag khang du spyani nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhongan phyag byed pa dang/ dge 'dun mngon gus par bkur sti byes nas/ mdo sde'i don 'dri bar byed/
pa dang/ sdom par yang dag par blangs nas nyas ra 'chags par byed pa dang/ nor rdzas dag yongs subatang nas da na mchog gsum gyi zhel ta byed pa dang/ lus dang sreg la 'phangs pa//
med par chos chen pa yongs su bsrung zhing yang dag par 'dzin pa/rabyed pa'i gang zag de lta bu dag na gom pa gcig 'dor bar byed nu yang lha'i gzhal med khang drung du 'ong nga/ ma 'ongs pa na khyim
bdag shug de ka bzhin du rnam par sman pa'i 'bras bu skyod bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni/ skyes bu mchog tu dge ba zhes bya'o// ma dge ba'i sems dang ldan pa ji ltabu zhe na/ sems can gang
la la zhig gtsug lag khang du 'jug pa'i tsho/ dge 'dun la slongs na dang/ g.yar po dang/ snga skyon 'ba' zhig khyabarasams pa dang/ dge 'dunagyi skyon tshol zhing rtsagasi tu rnam par dag
da 'ba' zhig tu 'dod pa dang/ dog slong dang/ dge 'dun gyizas zos na yang sems la gnongab ci yang med cinge/ 'khur ba dang/ shing thogatang lham lcum dag khyer nas/ rang gi khyim
du'agrol byed pa'i gang zag de lta bu dag shi 'phos ma thag tu lcags kyi thu lumaza ba'i sems can dmyal bar ltung zhing/ srungs kyi nang du btseb dwang/ sbyar ba'i mes
bsregs sa dang/ ral gri lta bu'iro lo ma can gyi ljon shing la 'dzeg pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang yang ma myong ba med par 'gyur// 'di na skyes bu mchog ma dgakha zhus pa'o//
bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsalapa/ kun dga' bo 'dani nges ma 'ongs pa'i dus ni slob ma rnams la rjes su bstan pa an gyis/ bag yod par bsgrims te/ dkon mchog gsum
po dag la nyes pa ma byed pa dang/ nur ba'i sems skye ba med par de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka'astsal pa bzhin byed na/ de bzhin gshegs pabyams pa 'jig rten du byungapa'i tshi/ yongs
su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba the tsom med do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// tshe 'di la kha nan gyi lus las gos bshus te 'phrog par byed na/ sha 'dres nas grang ba'i sems
can dmyal bar ltung ba dang/ gzhan yang dar gyi srin bur skyes nas 'tshod par 'gyur ro// tshe ba de la sku gzugs dang/ mdo sde'i spyan sngar mar me sbar ba mngon par ma dga' na/ shi 'phos
nas ri khor yug gi bar nasems can dmyal ba'i gnas mun nag yodapa dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la sems can gyi srog bcad pas dmyal nang gtub par byed na/ sha 'as nas
[s/ ]bcad nas log pa'i lha la mchod sbyin byas pa gang yin pa de ni/ shi 'phos nas lcags kyi gtun gyis brdungs pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// 'di la bon po byas nas
'dre 'don gyi tshig 'don cing gzhan dog bslus te nor blangs pa gang yin pa de ni/ she 'e posanasasha' ra lta bu'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la bon ma byas nas mgo
btsums te/ sa la nyal nas gzhan dag la mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur re nas drung pa ma yin pa'i 'a dre gdon dag gas len pa gang yin pa ren/ sha 'a pasonas rkad pa gtub pa'i sems can dmyal
bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la ston pa byas nas gzhan dag gi srog bcad de/ lha'adra rang/ lam lta'i sa' ba dag pa dang/ sranimo la sogs pa la mchod pa btsugs pa gang yin pa 'di/
lta bu la sogs pa de dgaThams can skyes bu blun po rnams 'drid pa yin pas shi'i sa nas sta res kacod pa'i sems rnamyal kharaltung bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma rnams
kyis yan lag bcad tsang gtub pa dang/ bya lcags kyi mchu can rnams kyis ma'og gi 'bras bu gnyis la 'thog par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di lo bon pa byasonas/ ma shi ba'i ro rnams skyed pa dang/
khang khyim rnams kyi bzang ngan dang/ rigs lnga po rnams kyis kha thob pa dang/ ma thob pa lta ba dang/ klu rnams bde bar 'god pa dang/ dar gyi srin bu dag la gtang rag gtong ba dang/
can gyi lus kyi yan lag bcad cing gtubs pa gang yin pa de ni/ sha la phes nas lcags bya'i khor 'a dang ldan pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro//
tshe 'dal dge 'dunagyi shing thog brkus pa bang Ane pa de ni/ shi 'phos nas lcags kyi thu lum zapa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'di'i phragagid+d+haM dang sha zos pa/
tsa gang yin pa dan/ shi 'phos nas ldanusngon gyis gang ba'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// tsho'adil tu son pa'i zes pa gang yin pa da ni/ shi 'phos nas mtshon cha dang
dbyig pa dang/ mal gro so can gyi ljon shange dang ldan pa'i simasacan dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ro// tshe 'di la ma yar mar gyur nas chung ma sngon ma'i bu dag la nar bcas pa gang yin pa da ni/
'bu 'thos nasam rab tu 'bur ba'i shing rtadang ldan pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la phra ma byas nas dkrugs ma byas pa gang yin pa de na/ sha 'phos nas lcags kyi
n+ti thong gshol gyis rmo ba'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la mi snyan pas gzhan dag la spyob gang yin pa de ni/ shi 'phos nas lce rab tu 'byon pa'i sems can dmyal
bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la btsun mang du smras pa gang yin pa de ni/ shi 'phos nas lce lcags kyi gzer gyis 'dongs pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la srog
bcad nas log pa'i lha la mchod sbyin byas pa gang yin pa de ni/ sha 'i phyis nas lcags kyi gtun gyise brdungs pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur// rma'adu la ben pa byas nas
'dre 'don gyi tshig 'don cing gzhan dog bslus te nor blangs pa gang yin par ni/ she 'e posanas sha'iri lta bu'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la bon mo byas nas mag
btsums te/ sa la nyal nas gzhan dag lo mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro nas drung ngo ma yin pa'i 'dre gdon dag gis len pa gang yin pa de ni/ shi 'phosaMnas rkad pa gtub pa'i sems can dmyal
khar ltung bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la ban pa byas nas gzhan dag gi srog bcad de/ lha 'dra dang/ lam lnga'i sa'i bdag pa dang/ sranam la sogs pa la mchod pa btsugs pa gang yan pa 'di/
lta bu la sogs pa de dag thams car na skyes bu blun po rnams 'drid pa in pas/ ga de bos nas sta res khacod pa'i sems dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma rnams
gyis yan lag bcad cing gtub pa dang/ bya lcags kyi mchu can rnams kyis mag ga 'bras bu gnyis la 'thog par 'gyur// tshe 'di lo bon re byas nas/ mi shi ba'i ro rnams skyed pa dang/
khang khyime rnams kyi bzang ngan dang/ rigs lnga po rnams kyis kha thob pa dang/ thob pa lta ba dang/ klu rnams bde bar 'god pa dang/ dar gyi srin bu dag la gtang rag gtong ba dang/
sraten nas/ skyes bu blun po dpag bslus te/ nor mang pa blangs pa dang/ brdzun tshig bzang ngan ston pa gang ane ra de dag na/ shi 'phos nas lcags kyi dri ba can gyi/
sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur bas/ bya 'dab chags ma rungs patshad med pa srid de lus la 'du// sha rnams ma lus par rjes nas rus pa dang/ rgyus pa rnams kyang 'brel
par byed pas/ sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa dag skyong bar 'gyur ro// tsho'adi la sman pa byas te/ nad gso bar m nus bzhin du gzhan dag la bslas tanor blangs pa gang yin pa dan/ sha'aphro
nas gtar ba dang/ mi btsas ba sregs pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur bas/ lus 'a kun tu me rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la mchod rten dang/ gtsug lag khang
bshag pa dang/ mkhan pa dang/ slob dpon gyis bsgo ba mnyan pa dang/ pha ma las zhumed pa gang yin pa der gnaM/ shade phos nas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po dang/ sems
can dmyal bachen po brgyud pa dag tu sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong ba dang/ gzhan yang sems can dmyal bachung du brgya sum cu rtsa drug pa kun tu 'jug cing/ bskal pa gcige gam/ bskal pa
gnyis sam/ bskal pa lnga brgya'i khor du sdugabasngal myong nas/ de'i 'ogatuganodaThar rar 'gyur te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyenadong phrad nan/ byang chub tu sems skyed par 'gyur la/ gal te/
phrad daramasgyuranan/ slar yang sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mar gyurakyang lus kyis ngo tsha zhing shin tu mnam pa dang/ khri snyan zhing
dgrol dka'ago gang yin pa dan/ sngon gyi rje mo byas pa las 'ongs pa Anano/ mar gyur kyang 'gro ba la dga' zhing/ zan khral 'grus pa dang nyam nga ba dag la 'byor pa med pa gang yin pa de na/

sngon byas pa las 'das pa yin no/ ma gyur kyang grang ba dang tsha ba dag bzod cing sems la 'tshan pa med pa gang gne pa de ni/ sngon gleng byas pa las 'ongs pa yon no// mir gyur kyang sgra sar che ba
dang ngo tsha med cing khrel med pa dang/ srid pa dang/ drang ba mang zhing lags nyes 'bye brag ma phyed pa bang ane pa tan/ sngonagyi long bu byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no// mir gyur kyang rtag par
sha la bsam zhing/ bya ba dag la 'jigs pa med pa gang yin pa ni/ sngon seng ge byas pa las 'ongs pa ni// mgyur kyang lus ring zhing mgo zlum pa dang/ 'brog dgon pa na mang du rgyug/
dang ( bu dang chung ma snang ba gang yin pa de ni/ sngon stag byas pa las 'ongs pa lanen// marigyur kyang thun zhing mi chung ba dang/ gnas gcig tu gnas bar ms pa med pa gang yin pa
da ni/ sngon bya 'dab chags byas pa las 'ongs pa min no// mir gyur kyang rang bzhin ma brtan zhing srog chags phram gsod pa la dga' ba gang yin pa ran/ sngon gyi wa byas pa las 'ongs
ba yin no/ mar gyur kyang dba' zhing ba shor ba dang/ 'dod chag chung zhing chung ma la sred pa med pa gang yin pa de ni/ sngon spyang khyi sa pa las 'ongs pa yin no//
mar gyur dgos bzang pa lam dga' ba dang/ ma yin pa byas ba dag la rtog pa dang/ gnyid chung zhing zhe sdangamang ba'ang yin pa ni/ sngon khyi byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no// mir gyur
kyang lus kyi bong chung nang la g.yem pa la dga' zhing skye bo mang pa'i lo dedu 'ong ba'i gtam brjod pa la mngon par dga' kha gang yane pa don/ sngonanatsongs pa las 'ongs pa yin no// mir gyur
khyad lus kyi bod chung zhing g.yem pa la dga' ba dang/ sems rtse gcig tu ma gnas pa dang/ gzugs marom thag tu mngon par zhen pa'i sems 'byung ba de ni/ sngon tse'amachil pa byas do/
las 'ongs pa nano/ par gyur kyang mag dmar zhing sazungabarung/ smra ba'i tshe sgrub 'byung zhing/ nyalan gos kyis lus da kr-i bar byed pa gang yin pa don/ sngon gyi sbrul dang cungs pa byas pa/
las 'ongs pa yin no// mar gyur kyang smras ma thog tu khong khro zhing/ pha rol gyidon la so sor mo rtog pa dga'i dug pa 'byin pa yang yin pa nani/ sngon sngage pa byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no//
mar gyur kyang gcig bu dben par go gnas shing zas la brkam pa dang/ mtshan mag re chung ba gang yin pa de ni// sngon bya re byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no// mar gyur kyang rtsig pa phug nas rkun/
pa byed pa dang/ nor la gnam ri khon 'byung sla ba dang/ rang gi mtshan ma med pa'i ng mAni ba dan/ sngon byi ba byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa//
mar gyur kyang mchod rten dang/ gtsug lag khang bshig pa dang/ dkena mchog gsum gyi dkor sbas nas/ bdag nyid gyur yongs su spyod pa gang yin pa de ni/ shi 'phos nas sems
can dmyol bachen por mnar med par ltungabar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba las thar par gyuran yang/ dud 'gro'i skye ba gnas lus 'di lta ste/ phugaron dang/ mchil pa dang/ ngur
bu dang/ na tso dang/ bya'i sngon bodong/ ta dang rus sbal dang/ smra'u dang/ ri dgas kyi lus len par 'gyulo/ brgya laman ma'i lus thob par gyur na yang/ ma ning dang/ bud/
med dang/ mtshan ganyis pa dang/ dbang pamed pa dang/ smad 'tshong ma dag tu 'gyur ro// mar gyur kyang khong khro ba dag la mngon par dga' ba da ni/ sha 'phos nas sbrul gdug pa dang/
stag dang/ seng ge dang/ dom dang/ drod dang/ byal dar/ bya khra 'i rnam pa dag tu byung bar 'gyur brgya lam brgya lam nama'ilus thob par gyuran yang/ khyimo dang bgagased
pa dang/ gshan pa dang/ rngon pa dang/ byagasher ba dang/ btson srungs byed pa la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro// mar gyur kyang glen zhing gti mug pa dang/ rigs pa'i tshul gong an

wa/ 'gyur ro// mar gyur kyang khengs shing nga rgyal che ba gang yin pa dan/ sha 'os nas mi gtsang ba'i nas kyi srin bu dang/ rnga ma dang/ bong bu dang/ rta nong/ khya deg gtu ltung bar 'gyur ro/
gal te mare skyes na yong/ bran mo'i lus len cing dbul 'phongs pas slongs ma byed pa dang/ mang po kun gyis bar s shade smad pa dag tu tul bar 'gyur ro// mar gyur kyang bla ma'i mkhru
bstan pa'i rgyus gzhan gyi nor len pa gang yAn pa de ni/ shi 'phos nas shar lta bu'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur zhing/ skye ba brgya stong mang posaM lus kyi sha bcad nas zla bar 'gyur
ro/ tshe' dol gzhan dag bgrang du gzhug pa la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa da ni/ tsha'aphos nas glang po che dal tu skye zhing/ nang log drang bas nyal du med pa dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ro//
'di la mchod ston dral nas nubam zan thos pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshe'aphos nas yi dgas 'drebakren dag tu ltung bas/ le brgya mang por bza' ba dang btung ba thob par mi 'gyur ro/ 'gro ba'i
[d/ ]lca tshig sad kun tu merd tu 'khur bar 'gro/ tshe 'di'i sminamer 'dug pa la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa dan/ tsha' sa nas grangs bas slebs pa'i srin bu dag tu skye bar 'gyur
tsho 'dul mchod ston gyi zas lcagam khyer ba gang yin pa de ni/ khri 'phos nas sa gzhi rab tu tshaba'isems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/ khargyal mare skyes par gyuran ang/
lkog mnad kyis btab pa dang/ tshe thung bar 'gyur ro// tshor dal rab zhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la phyag byed n yang mgo bos la mi gtug pa gang yin pa den/ shi 'phos nas mgazur
du dpyang ba'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur te/ brgya lamanama'i nang du skyes na yang/ gzhan dag gis mang du slu bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la phyag byas
pan/ thal mo mi sbyor bar byed pa gang yin pa don/ shi 'phos nas yul mtha' 'khob dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhing/ 'khod pa mang po btsal yang ca yong 'thob par ma 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la dril chen
sgra thos kyang ma ldang bo gang yin pa den/ shi'i posanas sgrubalus chen de dag tu ltung bar 'gyur zhing/ lus rang la tshabs srog chags phra mo mang po rnams kyis bza' bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'di le/
lag pa rgyab tu bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyagacus pa gang yin pa de ni/ shi 'phos nas phying ka log tu bcings pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur te gal te ma'i skyes/
par gyuran/ nyes pa med par gyod 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'di'i thal mo sbyar nas yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te/ phyag byas pa gang yin la de ni/ rtag par
chorags btsun par 'gyur zhing/ rgyun du bde ba skyed bar 'gyur ro// tsho'al khro skyen ning ltal 'khang ba gang lan pa de ni/ sngon smon pa byas pa la 'ongs pa yin no// tshe 'di la mkheg ya
tsamar gyur pa gang yin pa don/ sngonolag pa'i sems kyis nan gyi chung ma la bltas pa las gyur pa yin no// tshe'adi la chung ma'idon byas nas lam la spros pa gang yin pa re ni/ shi
'a bos nas lcathong gal gyis rgod pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la chang gnad du bsnan te/ gzhan dag la sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas chu'i nang du srin
bu dag tu skye bar 'gyur to/ brgya la mi'i nang du skyes par gyuran ang/ lus sgrung zhing dbugs thung bas 'chade'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ji skad du
bstan pa'i sdugakhostsal sna tshogs mang po da dgazums cad ni/ sdig pa mi dag kha'i las rnam pa bcu'i dbang las gyur pa yin pas/ rab gang yAn pa de ni sems can dmyal ba'i rgyu dang
rgyun byed par 'gyur ro/ 'bring gang yin pa de ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi rgyu dang rkyen byed par 'gyur ro// tha ma gang yin pa ren yo dgas kyi rgyu dang rkyen byed par 'gyur ro// srog gcod pa'i
kha na ma tho pa de ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye ba nas dang/ gshin rje'i 'o ja'i de rten dag tu ltung bar 'gyur// gal tema'i skyes par gyur na yang/ rnam par smin
pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis 'thob par 'gyur te/ tshozung banang nad mang pa gang yin pa'o/ mkhyin par len pa'i kha na ma tho ba gang yin pa ni/ soms can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i
skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'a'i ji'i rten dag tu lungakhar khyadad/ gal te ma'i skyes par gyur na yang/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis la thob par 'gyur te/ dbul zhing 'gongs pa dang
nor thun mong du 'gyur zhing rang dbang med pa gang yin mgo/ dod pas log par g.yem pa'i kha na ma tho ba gang yin pa den/ sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye
gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu ltung bar byed do/ khal te mare skyes par gyur na yang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis thob par 'gyur te/ chung ma gzhan gyis bya ba byed
pa dang/ chung ma dang phan tshun rtsod cing bdag sems kyis khams bzhin du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o// brdzun du smra ba'i khan mtho bgang yin pa re ni/ sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba dang
dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten tu ltung bar byed do/ gal te nari skyes par gyur na yang/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis 'thob par 'gyur te/ skur pa mang ba dang/
tog khar gzhan gyis chung duslus par 'gyur ba gang 'o/ bran byas pa'i nang thog gang na ba dan/ sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud
bgra'a gnas nig/ gnordzong 'dzadon gtusungaba'akhyodado/ gal te mir samad ranasong/ mkhar niba'i 'bras bu zlum bu gnyis 'ab par 'gyur// rtagapar sgra snyan pa/
thasalar 'gyur ba'ang/ ngas7ngarung/ rgyunarupyod can du 'gyur sugang tshanamago gabcul la sgruba'i khanamakhob gang mni pades n/ sems can rnams sems can dmyal/
gdang/ dud 'khrigasango/ sogi sgruba'i gnadachu byung bar byed do gal tags sam rgyun yang/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa la sa 'thob par 'gyur te/bden
la galcasanamang zhan medachos par lo kegyur tu rung/ smos pa las na rama'agyuralagang na'/ brnab sems bskyed pa'i lan ma thob gang yin pa risan/
! sems can rnams samasacan nAmal btang/dud go'i skyo gnas dang/ gshin po'i mdun du'ang bcudago gal te skyes nayang rnam losmin pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis 'tsho/
samtshan s dang/ mnga' tshal zhing rtagal yodogazhi dusangon 'grub par tsha'agyuralagang mgo/ gnod sems kyi kha na ma tho ba gang yin pa/
zab/degan/ sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro sbyi gnas dung/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu ltung bar byed do// gal te ma'i skyes bar gyur na yang/ rnam par smin
pa'i 'brasabu nub khyis myong bar 'gyurata/ rtagalar gzhan gyisim gsatshol bar 'gyur ba dang/ rtagalaganyen gyis gnod pa byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o// log par lta ba'i
ba thob gangagAn pa des ni/ sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'gi rten dag tu ltung bar byed do// gal te ma'i skyes par gyur na yang/ rnam
bar sman pa'i 'brasatunasobatusogasarapa te/ rtag pa la blta ba'i khyimita tu khar bdang/ sems g.yos dngabacas par 'gyur ba'ang yA'i pa'o/ kye ma ngan
rgyas kyi spus rnams de ltar na/ gi kha'i sa bcu pa rnams nasdug bsngal m dpe snatshogs gi lung chen po'i rgyu dang rkyen du gyur pa yin/ des da'i ching bor 'dug la
chen mo nyid du ga pa'i kha'i 'os bcu dag byas pa dad Ane pa dod bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par zhi pa la gsakhashadapa thos pa dang/ donag
khamasacad skadachor tsungs dusas/ bcom ldan 'dasala'adaskaces gsal/ khacom ldan 'dasakhadagacag dge dzilta bu zhig rgyudan/ sdug bsngal 'di dag las smar par 'gyur 'gas
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi las la gzud par bya ste/ ji ltar bsod nams mngon par bsgrub par bya zhe na/ sems
/ can gang la la zhi tshe 'di la yongs su skul pa'i bdag po chen po byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchodartan dwang/ dragatsang khang dang/ gtsug lag khang du rtsi gsen/ ma 'ongs pa na/

'tsha gdonam bro bar rgyal po byed cing/ skyabo mang po la dbang byed par 'gyur bas/ gang yang ngag mi nyanar med par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la grong dang/ grong gi gtso bor gyur kyang drang kan che zhing chos bzhin du
tshu skyeng bar byed gang yin pa ren/ ma 'ongs pa na gdon mi za bar rgyal po'ablon po byed par 'gyur zhing/ gos zas dang/ rta phun sum tshogs pa dang/ ci dang ci 'o dod pa 'byor par 'gyur//

mo' da la skye bo mang po bsod namasabyed ra/ra bskul zhinge la gzud pa gang yin pa dan/ ma 'ongs pa ni gdon mi za bar tshogs btsun zhing shin tu phyug pa'i khyim bdag tu 'gyur bar skye'o// mang pa kun
gyis bkur ba dang/ phyogs bcu pa dag tu don gnyer ba dag kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la mar me gzugs nas mchod pa byed pa la mngon par dag 'od gang yin par ni/ nyi zla ltar skye bar
'gyur bas/ 'od zer gyis bdag nyid gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la sbyin pa gtong ba la dga' ba dang/ byams pa'i sems kyis srog chags gsobar dga' ba gang yin pa don/
0skye ba thams cad du phyug por 'gyurabs gos zas dag rang 'byung bar 'gyur// tshe 'a di'i skye bosang rnams la bza' ba dang/ btung ba la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa/ ra na/ skye ba/
thums ca da du lu'i zas rang 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ gzugs dang stobs phun sum tshogs pa dang/ dbang po rno zhing slobs pa dang ldan pa dang/ tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// gang gis dud 'gro'i
skye gnas su song ba'i rnams la sbyin pa yongs su btang na/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu rgya 'gyur stod 'tsho bar 'gyur/ 'do chen pa dag la sbyin pa yongs su btung na/ rnam par sman pa stong
'gyur srid 'ab par 'gyuro// tshul khri'i sa dang ldan pa'i dge slong la sbyin pa yongs su btangan/ rnam par smad pa khri 'gyur snyad 'thob par 'gyur ro/ gang gis theg pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i
gsang ba'i stong pa 'khoramang po la yang dag par bsgrags nas/ sems mig 'byed pa'i chos smra ba gang dag la sbyin pa yongs subatang na/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu tshad med pa snyad 'thob par
'gyur ro// la nga gis sangs rgyas dang byang chu bsams dpa' rnams la sbyin pa yongs su btang ne/ rnam par smon pa'i 'bras bu mthar thug pa med pasAd la longs spyod par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang
gang khraga rnam pa gsum la sbyin pa yongs su btang na/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang/ pha mdang/ nad pa rnams so// zas za
gcig tsam yongs su btang bas kyang/ rnam dpar smin pa'i 'bras bu tshad med pa sud 'thob par 'gyur ro// rtag par yongs su btang bas/ yongs su gtug sa par ma 'gyur ba la

lta smos kyang ci dgos/ tsho 'di la dge 'dun mang po'i sku bas re ba gang yin pa de ni/ skyed khams cad du byad bzhin sdugatsang mdzes pa dang/ rangabazhin gos zas dang ldan pa dang/ skye bo mang pa kun gyi so bkur

bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'ad la bsngags pa brjod pa dang/ mdo sde'i chos klog cing kha ton du 'don par dga' da gang yin par ni/ skye ba'i gnas thams cad du sgra dbyangs snyan cing thos pa rnams rab tu dga'
bar 'gyur ro// tsha'adi la tshul khrims bsrung bar mngon par dga' ba gad yon ra da ni/ skye ba thams cad du byung bzhin sdug cing/ me nang na mchog tu 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la las kar khron
pa brkos nas skye shange btsugs nas grib ma mang dpo kun la bsgrubs par mngon par dug ga' ba gang yin pa de ni/ skyo ba thams cad du mi'i rgyal po byed cing/ ro brgya dang ldan pa'i bza' ba
dang/ btung ba bsams pa tsam gyis 'byor dar 'gyur ro// tsha'adi la mdo sde bris te gzhan dag la byon nas/ klog tu bcug pa la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni/ skye ba thams cad
du bdag gi spobs pa mang po dang ldan pa dang/ chos bslab pa la lan cig thos pa tsam gyis go bar 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin gyis slob cing yongs/
su bsrung ba dang/ rtag par ma'inang na mchog dam pa gtso bo byed par 'gyur ro// tshul di la zam pa dang gru gzings bcas nas skye bo mang po zlos par mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni
skyed thams cad du rin po che sna bdun phun sum tshogs pa dang/ skye bo mdape kun gyis bkur zhing bsngal sa pa darjod nas mngon par dga' ba dang/ phan tshun 'gro zhing 'ongs pa'i tshomang po
kun gyis bsnyen bkur dang rim gro byed par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' khongs ji skad dumado ste de dang de dag tu rgyu dang 'bras bu bstan nas/ sems can mang po nas+sa
klog pa dang/ kha ton du 'don pa dang/ mngon par bsgrub par bskul nas sdug bsngal rgyu bgags las yongs su bzlas pa de bzhin du/ 'dir yang de ltar bstan pa yin pas/ gang la la zhig gis chos
kyi rnam grangs 'di b+bes nas/ skur pa 'debs par bye de bden tshe 'di nyid la lto'i dbang po ltang bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
ldan 'dasachos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ ji ltar yongs su gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni legs nyes kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu/
bstan pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub par smon lam btab ra zhes bya bar yang zung zhig khacom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'dabastan pa na lha dang mi stong
phral brgyad cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// dge ba spyod pa'i bud med brgya stong dum tsha'adi nyid la bud med kyi dbang po gyur nas/
skyes pa'ilus mno par grub par gyur to// sdig pa spyod pa'i skye dgu stong nyis brgya na gdug pa'i sems spangs nas/ bdag gi tshe rabs dran par gyur to// dge ba spyod pa'i skye bo tshad med pa
dgan mo skyeba'i bzed ra thob nas/ rtag par bde ba myong bar gyur to// tsho'agro bar 'gyur ba tshadamed pa/sad na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skyes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa'i grogs su gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'khor 'dus pa thams cad rang gi gnas su dong ste/ bsod nams mngon par 'du byed
cing rab tu dga' bas dga' dazhin du spyod par gyur to// 'phags pa legs nyes kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu bstan pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so// gzhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+hi
chos grub kyis rgya gar dang rgyu'i dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// ka @#// rgyu gar skad du/ ak+Sha tra ya nA ma sU tra/ bod skad du/
bslab pa gsum gyi mdo zhes bya// songs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag ga gsathos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul spyod
byed na/ ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang/ grod smra'i bucan du byon te/ gleng spu'i bu can gyi grong gi byang phyogs kyi deshangasA la'i tshalan/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen pa dang thabs cig/
tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'dasabyas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dog slong dag 'di dgag tshul khrims yin no// 'di ni ting nge 'dzin yin no// 'di no shes rab yin no//
dge slong dag tshul khrims la goms par byas na/ ting nge 'dzin la yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin la goms par byas na/ shes rab thob par 'gyur ro// shes rab la/
goms par byas na/ 'di lta sku/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang rang/ gtaM mug gtag las/ sems yang dag pa khonar rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// de ltar sems yang dag pa kho nar
rnam par grol ba'i 'phags pa nyanas kyisan/ bad ga gi zug pa 'di rbad do// tshangs par spyod pa ni bsten to/ byu ba na byas so// 'dilas srad pa zhan ma shes so zhes yang dag
pa khenar shes par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yar ngas te/ rtsom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bslab
pa gsum gyi mdo rdzogs so/// rgya gar skad du/ A kAyaN+Di nAmam tsAyAn sU tA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sku gsum pa nas
bya ba theg pa chen pa'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'dus/
rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' tshadamed grangs med pa dang/ lha dang/ klu rang/ 'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ bcom
ldan 'das la bkur stir bgyid cing mchod do// de'i tshe 'khor dor byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snyinger 'dug pa stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
ldan 'das la sku du mnga'/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sa'i snying pa'i com ldan 'das de bzhin gshags kha lu sku gsum mnga' ste/ chos kyi sku dang/ ka'ongs spyod rdzogs pa'i
sku dang/ sprul pa'i sku'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum ni/ rang bzhin rnam par dag panachos kyi skug ting nge 'dzani rnam par dag pa ni longs spyod rdzo ga gas pa'i sku'o/ spyod
pa rnam par dpog pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sku// rigs kyi khu de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku ni nam mkha' ltar rang bzhin med pa'i don no// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skun/
sprin ltar 'byung ba'i donano// sprul pa'i skun sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi 'phrin las to/ char pa lta bu ste thams cad dngas pa'i don to// bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa'
sa'i sAng bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsum gyi bshad pa ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dang sa'i stong pa la bka' stsal
pa// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa/'i sku gsum n 'di ltar blta bar bya'o// chos kyi sku ni de bzhin gsham gas pa'i de bo bgrang la blta bar bya'o// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku na/ byang chub
sems dpa'i ngo bogongal blta bar bya'o/ smralo pa'i skun mos par spyod pa'i so so skye bo'i ngo bo gang labalta bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos sku ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang rang bzhin mthun par/
gnas so// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni so sa rgyas thams cad dang ting nge 'dzin mthunang ra ba nas go/ sprul pa 'a[M]na sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'phrin las mthun par gnas so// rigs
kyi bu kun gzhi gnas su dag pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te/ chos gyi sku'o// nyon mongs pa'i sa de gnas su dag pan mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so// yod kyi rnam par shes pa gnas su dag
pa ni so sor kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes te/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skugo/ sgo lnga'i rnam par shes pa gnas su dag pa ni ba sgrub pa'i ye shes te/ sprul pa'i sku'o// de nas byang chub sems
dpa ba sa'i snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las dam pa'i chos blos pa nirag tu legs so// bde bar gshegs pa red//
tu legs so// bcom ldan 'das/ kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das lasachos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang gis rab tu 'dzin pa des// bcom ldan 'das
tshad med cing dpag tu med pa thob go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying pa dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri zer
bcas pa'i 'ja'i rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sku gsum pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
@#// rgya gar skad du/ sad d+harma rA dza mahAyAn sUtA/ bod skad du/ dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal pa thag pa chen po'i mdo// de'i tshe sangs rgyas shade sA la gnyis kyi
bar n dazhugs te/ mya ngan las 'das par gshagasakar/ sems can khams bod brgya stong khri 'bum pa la mang dag kun rang gi drung na/ sangs rgyas 'khor bar bskor te/ 'khod nas mog na ra
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta ste/ cung zad kyang ma g.yengs/ danas yang dag par gshegs pas/ 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'od chen po btang nas/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad
khyab par snang ste/ 'od de'i nang nas chos kun mngon par bstan nas/ da'i tsho mang po'i nang na byang chub sems dpa'i mong nanam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba zhig yod pa/ stan las langs taM//
sang sa rgyus la lan gsum bskor nas/ spar des gcig tu 'dug ste/ lus smad lnga sa la gtugs te mchi ma rlags nas/ sang sa rgyas la gsol pa// lha'i nang na btsun pa yang dag
par gshegs pas/ myang n las 'das par gshegs pa'i dus kyang nyi/ gshegs su yang sladan/ rtog pa rnam pa lnga'asumus can las ngan pa mang bgyudi tsung/ ngan pa bcu sha stag
spyod pa 'di lta bu'i sems can legs pa'idapal gyi stobs bskyabs pa la sangs rgyas kyis shin tu zab cing dam pa'i chos kyi yi gasna bcu gnyis bshad pa// u re la 'bu ni mangs/ gzhung ni
rgyus pas khong du chud cing 'tshol bar dgya ba'ang dka'/ chos 'od kun blta zhing rjes kyang mi chod na/ sangs rgyas kyis byams shing thugs rjes gzigs te/ thag pachen po'i chos kyi yis/
sna pa'i bden pa bye brag phyed par ngo shad de/ sems can rnams yang dag pa 'osman bzang po thob par 'gyis te/ nad sdug go rtog sos par bgyur smon no// sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chub sem
dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa// shin tu dge'o// shin tu dge'o// rigs kyi bu pho khyed kyis sems can rnamos kyi phyir 'di lta bu'i donachen po 'dra nus pa// bsod nams chen po thob
ste/ bsam gyi mi khyab bo// ngas khyod la yang dag pa'ibaden pa theg pa chen po'i chos bye brag phyed pa// mi 'gyur ba'i sa zhung rdzogs par bshad do// ci'i phyir zhes byasun/ sems can rgya cher thar
par bya ba'i phyi'i go/ sems can rnams mya ngan dang grub par bya ba'i phyi'i go/ sems can dmyal ba'i nyon mongs pa la sa phyin cid yul gtsang mar skye bar bya ba'i
phyir ro// yang dag par grol thor cing skya ga las 'das par bya ba'i phyir ( khyed rnams kun sems gcig tu sems shig dang/ khyed la go bar bshad do// de nas phal mad pa kun tu dga'
gna' ste/ kha tha dad kyis kyang tshag 'thun par cig car smras pa// sangs rgyas kyis byams shing thugs rjes gzi'i sataM/ bdag cag rnams lubye brag phyed par bshad par smon no/
sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas/ rigs kyi bu pa rnams grol thar par 'dod na/ 'dod pa'i yan lagabacad la sems gnyis su bsam par gcig tu bsams te/ dpabasams pa'i sems btang ngo/

sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyi tshul ni stong pa ste/ sems kyi re ba nyidakyi nang na'ang med do// gtang ba'angamed do// blang budang gtang du med na ci mang thob pa med do// de'i mong byang chub bo// ji lta zhen/
mya ngan la mang po kun n sems gcig las skyes so// sems ni sems namya ngan kyang mi skya ste/ 'du mched dang/ shes rang rnams la blang ba dang btang ba med de// blang ba dang da gtang
ba med na 'dod chags so cog dang bral lo// 'dod chags so cog dang bralan 'dod pa'i yan 'a gamad do/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'amadzod kyis/ sangs rgyas la gsol pa/
ba'am/ sems can gyi 'du mched dang/ shes rab kyi legs nyes skye nus pa'i lan bon ldang ba'i gnas bags te/ phyi nang zhu gnyis kyi chos so cog gcig gnang du gcig zhugs na/ ci'i slad
nas de'i nangan blang ba dang gtang ba ma mchis zhes 'gyur rung/ sang sargyus kyis/ byang chub senas dpa 'anam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu mos ma gtan gcig tu 'dug pa'i

nang du zhugs la// kun gyi phyi nang du brtags na sha mar yong medado/ de ci'i phyir zhan/ nang du bltas/ nang du brtag gsan/ yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid la skye ba med/ phyi'i bltas/ phyir brtags la/ marag pa ma ldan

skye ba'ang med pa 'ang med na/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngamed de/ de ni gtsang ba dang ba yin no// de ni mchog tu dga' ba'i sman yin no// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis/ sangs rgyas la gsol
pa/ bcom ldan 'das la nga dag par khagshegs pas sgrig gal chen po'i chos yang dag pa'i gzugs ni tu zab cing gces pa/ blon ma mchis pa'i sman bzung pa dang/ theg pa gcig gi 'don pa'i nang du
'jug pa bshad n slan chad kyisems can g gtsang ba'i las gsum gyis ngan pa bcu'i las bgyis te/ log sred kyi las spyad pas rtsa ba dang gzhu grazhing zhan te/ sems la gzungs su bzung ba 'am dga'
sa/ smanatangand kyang gal tam mthun/ thabs ji ltar bs sen/ sbag pachen po zhing du'ajug par rung/ sangs rgyas ni/ byang chub sems dpa banam ma kha' mdzod la bka' stsal la/ nga la thabs
[z ]@#// yod kyis/ theg pa chen po la 'jug par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis/ sangs rgyas la gsol pa// bcom ldan 'dus bod gags gna' sngon thes pa//

[ji ]yang dag par gsheng/ sa pas theg pa chen pa rini kha na pa thol tu phyin pa drug chos bshad/ thag pa bar ma'i mal na rgyu can bcu gnyis kyi chos bshad/ theg pa chung ngu'i nAlan bden pa bzhi'i chos bshad/
la/ log sred kyi mi la ni dge ba bcu'i chos bshad de/ kun kyang nad kyi gzugs dang sbyar nas// chos kyi sman bzang po bshad na/ de'i slad nas theg pa gcig chos bshad/ mi 'di rnam bzhi'i ra mda' bgyi/
sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chub sems dang 'anam mkha'i mdzod la bka' stsal pa// ngas thag pa gcig la lam gyi chos bshad pa ni dper na sa gcigs sa yod do cog bskyod ces thams cadra gso nus pa dang
mtshungs/ yang dper na chos kyi char pa'i rgyan gyis thams cad la khyab par yog ste/ sa las skye bo cog thams cad ngoms so// dper na 'bras sna gcig gichan bro dal 'jig rtan gyi sems can mi dang
mi ma yin pa kun za'o// zes se cig kun lus ni skye/ srog na 'tsho ste/ kun skye bar byas pa ni dparasman gyi rgyal po sman sbyor mkhas pas sman ga ces pa bzang pogatan spur tu/ sems can tsha ba'i
nad kyis btab pa la btang na grang bsil// sems can grong ba'and kyis btab pa la btang nan dro tsha'o// tshad pa na ba la btangan ni chad do// 'khyil ba la btab nani la tand ma sos pa med do//
ngas theg pa gcig bshad de mi bzhi'i nad rnams gsod yang de dang mtshungs s// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi// sangs rgyas la gsol pa// bcom ldan 'dus thabs ji/
lta bu spyad da ngan pa bcu dang sems can log sred de theg pa gcig du lam la 'jug par bgyi/ sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu pho nga pe/
theg pa gcig chos la theg pa gsum ldan te/ ang gdan theg pa gsum zhes bya ba bshad pa med do// khyod rtag par nyon cig dang/ khyod la zhib tu bshad do// rigs kyi lam pa'i chos kyi
lam mo// phyi me'agazhi ngobatud gtsag ste/ gnyis su mingan zamasacad spyad pa'i phyir thug pa gsum du bshad do/ theg pa gsum gyi chos kun gcig tu 'dus par brtag/ sems can no/
cog la rnam pa bzhi yin mod kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnyis sumed do// ji lta zhes bya na/ sangs rgyas sa tsog dang/ sems can no cog la ngo bo nyid gcig tu 'thun te/ mdo gcig
ste tha dad pa med na sems can rang gi sems kyis bye brag dbye ba g.yas sa// yongani sangs rgyas kyang sems can yang sangs rgyas yin te/ sems can no cog la yang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid
yod do// sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dang/ sems can gyi ngo bo nyid de gnyis kyang gcig ste/ ngo bo nyid gcig tu mtshungs mnyam ma// chos so cog dang yang mnyam pas na/ nga la thams cad
yod pas thegarag gcig la zhugs par bya'o/ rigs kyi bu shosems can de rnams kyi sems kyi mkhar dam du bsrung du btsud de/ rkun pa ma zhugs par bya'o// rnam par
sang shes pa drug bsgom chen pa rdordzas bsrungs/ bran la sems 'jug pa'i gnas la brtags te/ sems 'dug pa'i gnas shes na sems 'dug pa'i gnas na sems ma 'dug ga go// sems mi
'dug n gdod sems 'dug pa med do// ngan no cog la sems na 'dug cing bdu mchad khams la sems ma 'dug na/ 'dod pa'i yan lag gsaAs med do// 'dod pa'i yan lag med na sems
kyis 'dod cade btsal ba med do// sems la btsal ba medanasems ga la yang mi 'dug go/ gded de'i ming ni sams 'dug ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu phas mas can gyi sems kyis mya
ngan no cog byas pa kun kyang rnam par shes pa las g.yos te/ ma 'dus pa' lan no// sems 'dug n gdod mya ngan kyang med do// mya ngan mdan gdod byang chub yan no// byang chub
sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis/ sangs rgyas la gsal// bcom ldan 'das sems can lhums cad kyis mya nganano cog bgyis shangasams su 'dug la de tsazhogagi stobs kyis
bslang ste/ 'dod pa'i yan lag bgyis pa// sangs rgyas kyis khyamasashang thugasarjes gza'i sa te/ phal mang gol 'grol zhing bshad par smon no// sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/
sems can no cog gi sems kyi yan lag g.yog pas rang bzhin gyi stobs gnyis yod do// la nyis zhes bya ba gang yin zhen/ gcig 'du mched kyi phyi'i g.yos te/ sems kyi an 'dul
rang bzhin gyi stobs so// gnyis ni 'du mched kyi phyir ma lags kyi/ bdag gi sems 'a//rang langs te/ de na de dag gi rang bzhin gyi stegs so// rigs kyi bu pho da sems can rnams
kyi rang bzhin gnyis ma sa g.yo bar byas na/ gdod mya ngan kyang med byang chub kyang med de// myang n kyang med/ byang chub kyang med na/ gdod yang dag par bden pa'i gnas su chud de/ don kyang
chub yang dag pa/ Aneno// khyed la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems can zhig bstan cing drang na yang sems 'dug par ston cig/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyige/ sangs
rgyas la gsolar// bcom ldan 'das sems can bslab cing drang na de'i sems 'dul par bgyi na/ khams gang la 'dug na khyung chub thob pa ra rung/ sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa// shin tu dag 'o// shan tu dag go/ rigs kyi bu pho byed de 'dra'i mkhas/ sems kyi phyi mo 'odi lta bu 'dri ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dang/'chen po yin
te/ bsam gyis ma khyab go/ khyad brtag par nyon cig dang/ khyed la zhibatu bshad do// rigs kyi bu pho sems can bslabasang shang drangs// sems 'dug par byan/ 'dug pa ni nang na yang
ma 'dug/ rol na yang mi 'dug bar n yang ma de dugago/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa chen pa tshos kyang nang na mang ma'i dug/ rol na yang mi 'dug
bar na yang ma 'a du dge/ sems kyi shes pa gcig du la gnas te/ med pa'i gnas la 'dug pan byang chub thob go/ byang chub thod tu ni dbyang chub thob pa yong ched de/ de'i ming na
yang dag pa'i mgayo ba zhes bya'o// jalta zhas byas na/ mya ngan na be den pa las skyes te myu na kyang stong pa'o// chos secig kyang rang skyes bu med de/ chos kyang stong pa'o// sems zhes bya
rgyu ba yang ma 'a dang mang yod du zad kyithob par mdung ste/ sems kyang stong pago/ rigs kyi bu gosams stong pa mni pa/ra na/ stong pa'i sems gcig gi nang nas bden pa thams
cad la blta ba'i mo re'i gas so// thams cad la bltas na de'i ming na sems kyi dri ma zhes bya'o// sems la dri ma med na de'i ming ni brag ga pa zad pa zhes bya ba ste// mig dang/ kha dog dod
dung/ sems gsum tshar ang stong paste/ rtag par gtsang ngo/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzodabyas/ sangs rgyas la gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das chos satsog kun kyang d bzhi ni
lugs pa ltan/ sems can thamasacad chad lus gcig/ sems la gi/ khams gcig/ sangs rgyas gcig gi khams su chud par nus pa'i rigs// sangs rgyas gcig gi khams nas stong pa
gang zhing khyab pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi khams su 'juganus pa'i rigs/ sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' nam ma kha 'a mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khams
thams cad kyang kha nas kha cig tu gzhug tu rung de// khams gcig dang/ pad+mo'i gdan gcig dang/ yang dag par gshegs pa'i sku lus gcig gis khams thams cad kun rgyasungashing gang bar
dung ngo// kha mas thams cad mngon par bstanan/ kun kyang stong pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khams bzang du brgyan par yang rung go/ byang chub sems dpa' gcig gi lus kyis khams
thams cad gang rgyas par ang rung ngo// ba spu nyag ma gcig gi bu ga'i nang du khams thams cad shong bar yang rung ngo/ khams thams cad khams gcig ginang du gzhug pa dang/ sems can gcig

gi lus kyi nang du shong bar ma da rung de// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sa gcig dang// byang chub kyi rishang sdong po gcig las khams thams cad gang bar sadarung de// sgra skad snyan pa gcig gas khams thams
cad nga ste thams cad de bzhin thosang gide shes te/ kun dga' ga na 'a dar yang rung go chos spyod pa rnams chos de bzhin song bar shesan/ gzhan gyi yul khams thams cad dusangs rgyas kyi lus
btsal ba'i mi rigs kyi/ sems gcig dang khams gcig gi gnas la sangs rgyas kyi lus btsal ba'i gos go lus gcig gnang nas thams cad kyi lus 'byung bar nus so// thams cad kyi spyi
lus nang nas lus gcig 'byung bar nus so// ji lta zhes byan/ lus gcig ni sangs rgyas gcig lus yin no// lus mang po thams cad ni sems can gyi lus yin pas na/
kun sams ga cig las skyes so// sems gcig las skyes so// sems gcig pu dgen chos se cog bad par dag go/ sems gcig phyi mo mi dgen chos so cog zad par yang ma dga'// las ngan
ba byas na sems can ngan pa'i lus skyego/ khas dgakha byas na lha dang mi'i lus su skye'o// sems gcig pa yang sems gcig gi gzugs dang pral na sems kyi ge zul gas kyi nang na stong pa ste/ ci
la'ang theg pa med do// stong pa'i khams dang yang du lan blang ba med pa 'i sa nas dar rgyas kyi lus skye nus so// sangs rgyas kyi lus la lus gcig tu zad kyi gnyis su med do/ yang sangs rgyas
kyi ngo bo nyiden gcig go/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid gcig gi nang na sems kyi ngo bo nyid gcig tu zad do// sems gcig pa ma gtogs par gud du gzhan la khatsal ba med de/ gzhan la khatsal ba byas na
dan na dom dreng ba'o// ji lta zhes byas na/ sems kyi chos thams cad ni phyi legasanas btsal ba med do// phyi logs kyi gnas nas datsalan de'i ming gzhan zhes byago/ gzhan gyi gnas nas btsalan tani
ma bden pa/ byang chub sems dpa banam mkha' mdzodai/ sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sams gcig gi nang nas sangs rgyas thob par rungan/ thams cad kyi sems kyi nang na/ kun
la yang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyidamachis pa lta/ sems can thams cad kun la sangs rgyas kyi ri bo nyid mchis na yang dag par gshegs pa thams cad kyis sems gcig po spyad de/ sems can
thams cad bskyed nus te/ sems gcig lus gcig gis 'khrug pa bsal na/ sangs rgyas chos gzhan ma mchis na/ sangasargyus kyi chos kyi sku lus su skyes 'gas pa lta/ sangs rgyas kyis/
byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa// rig kyi bu pho dayin no/ da yin no// khyed kyis bshadu ba bzhin te/ sems can kun la yang sa rgyas kyi de nyid yod da/ sangs
rgyus yang dag pa gshegs pa thams cad kun gyis samag gcig pu'i chos spyad de/ sems can thams cad kyi sems sa tsog sems gcig pu'i nang du sangasargyus kyi chos tshol du btsud pas/
sangs rgyas kyi lus thob go/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis/ songasargyas la gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid mchis te/ sangs
rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi nang du btsal bas sangs rgyas thoban/ sems can thams cad so so'i sems kyi nang na yang sang sargyas lags te/ de thob par yang rung da mthong bar yang rung/
mthong bar gang rung lags pa lta/ sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chub sems dbang nam mkha' mdzod la dka' stsal pa// rigs kyi khu bo sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yang dag pa'i gzugs dam par
'jug pa ni ba cig sbyar yang marung ngo// mthog ces byar gang ma nga do mthong zhes byar nga marung/ mis bong zhes byar yang karang do/ dza zhes byas na/ byang chub sems dpa'

sangs rgyas kyi ri bo nyid yod ces bshad na/ de'i ming ni sa ngas rgyas la skur ro// sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid med ces bshad n ang sang sargyas la skur ro// sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin zhes bshad na yang

sangs rgyas la skur ro// sangs rgyas kyi ri bo nyid med ces bshad na yang sangs rgyas la skur ro// ji lta zhes byas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi sang sargyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod da ma lazhin na nam
mkha' dang mtshungs/ med pa ma yin na na'i bong gi rwa dang mtshud sa te/ ri bong gi rwa ni yang med do// nam mkha' nartag par yod do// gzugs kyi tshul ni yod pa ma mnano// nam mkha'i tshul na med

! pa ma yin no// gzugs kyi tshul kun dang bral nan ci la'ang chags pa med do// skye ba'a gnas la mi 'dug ste/ de la skye bar mthong na dri ma'o// mar po gnas na mi 'dug ste/ de la ma mthong na chad pa

rgyanas bya'o/ sems can gyi sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi dam pa'i gzugs ni de lta bu yin no// sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid med ces bshad na bstod de skur ro// sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid med ces ban
na smad du skur ro// sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod kyang yod/ yin kyang med ces bshad na log par skur ro// sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa'i ng ma yin/ med pa'i ngam yin zhes bshad n 'gran thor
du skar ro// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis/ sangs rgyas la gsel pa// bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi sangs rgyas de de tade dam pa de bzhin du zab ste/ 'du mchad kyi rnams
dang bral bas sa kyang gos pa ma mchis te/ dper na nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing phyi mo 'i ngo de 'dirtag par btsad nas ci'i slad nas/ sems can gyis mya ngan bgyi rnams bgyis/ mya ngan bgyis na
sems nyid dri ba lags pa lta na/ sems kyi dri ma de thog ma so las skyes pa bcom ldan 'das kyis thal mad pa la bshad de/ sems can gyi rnam sa kun gyis thos/ nga shes par bgyis te/ sems

can gyi rnams kyi mya ngan no 'tshal ba zhig ste// sems kyi dri ma bkrus khasal la bkab cing dkris pa yod brag bar smonano// de nas sangs rgyas 'dzum dmul zhes ba nad de/ phyag g.yon pas byang chub sems
dpa'i spyi bo la phyis te/ 'dachan pa btang nas thams cad kun du khyab par byas so// de nas sems can pha la mang po thams cad kun shin tu dga' gzha' 'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems can rnams kyi phyir de lta bu'i 'dri ba byas pa de'i mingan drang po dris pa ste/ sems can thar par bya ba yin na/ tshigagazhan drisan de mngon min par dris zhes bya ste sems can
brlag pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' khyod rung pa 'drinus pa/ sems can thar par byas pa yin no// khyed la sogs pa sems can kun sems gcig tu son sa la rtag par nyon te/ skyes pa'i
[r/ ]@#/ 'khrug pa'i sems sol la// phyi logs kyi don med par byas te/ sems kyi ade thub par 'dug cig dang khyod la bshad de// bshad pa thos na ngan pa bcu'i sems kun
grol khar pa thob go/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzodabs/ sangs rgyas la gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ba dag la sogs pa sems can phal mang po thams cad kun sems gcig
tu dgyis 'gags te/ 'khrug pa'i sems gzhan ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sa la mang po la dgrel bshad par smon no// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' dang phul
rgyunang bo rnams la bka' stsal pa// mya ngan thams cad n phyin ci log las skyes so// phyin ci log thams cad ni mi bden pa'i sems las skyes so// ma brten pa'i sems thums cad ni nga yod pa/
las skyes sa// nga yod pa thamadazhi phyi ma yong med pa la sa skyas sa// phyi mo med pa thams cad ni mi 'dug pa yin no// phyi mo med na yod pa ma yin no// yod pa ni dri ma'o// med pa ni tsang/

kyi ma'o/ dgatsang ma dar sa gnas ni rtag pa parol tu phyin pa yin no/ skyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// nga pha ro 2 tu phyin pa yin no// gtsang ma darol tu phyin pa/ Anino// da lta bu mthong ba da na
mang drang po mthong ba zhes bya'o// gzhan mthong ba na mong min pa mthong ba zhes bya'o// de lta bu mthong bzhi ma ni 'ang shes ra ba yod do/ gzhan mthong ba dan de la shes rab med do// shes rab med
pas ni thabs kyis bkrol lo// shes ra pa med pas ni zabs kyis bcing sa so// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis/ sangs rgyas la gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gtsang
mA'i gnas de na sems can la la zhig sems rtag turtag pa' sems g.yos sa// rtag tu skyod pa'i sems g.yo'o// rtag tu nga'i sems g.yo'o rtag tu gtsang ma'i sems g.yu'i//
shes rab yod pa lags te phyin ci log ma lags so// sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' la bka' stsal pa// sems can la la zhig de ltar sems pa ni ma drang pa nams
pa ste ma da drang po mthong ba yin no// ma de shes rab yod pa Anano// ji lta zhus byas na/ yang dag par gshegs pa'i chos kyis sku lus rtagad parob tu phyin/ skyid pa pha rol tu phyin/
nga pha rol tu phyin/ gtsang ma pa lags su phyin te/ gtsang gdang bar gnas sa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi sku lus da lta bur mthong ba'amo dan sangs rgyas kyi yang dag pa'i slob ma gtsug
pu yin te/ drang po'i chos las skyas/ chos las 'phrul te skyes/ sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas skyes/ sangs rgyas kyi brtan pa bzhi thob bo// ma tho mAl pa yin mod kyi/ brtan pa bzhi byang chub sems

dar 'a yin// rigs kyi bu pho nga 'das pa'i phyi na 'alnga brgya yang rung/ lo stong yang rung/ la stong lnga brgya lang rung/ de'i nang na yang ma la la zhig gis chos kyi yo ga 'a dpe zungs su bzung ste/ kha
ton dang klo gzhus bshad pa bzhin du las su byas te/ rtag di nga gtsang gi gnas la yid ches shing drang po mthong gi stod du chos 'di spyad dasems can bstan bslabs na/
sems can gcig bstan de'i ming byang chub sems dpa' 'o// mtha mal pa yin mod kyi/ yon phul kha blang du rung ste/ khyim nas byung ba'i ma aneno// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'
mdzod kyis/ sangs rgyas la gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das yong khyim nas byung ba'i mi de skra dang kha spu bregs la/ chos kyi gos gyon te/ tshul khrims tshang ba mnos te/ tha mal pa'i chos kyis sku

gos pa de'i mang na khyim nas kyang ste/ yong blang du rung ba zhes bgyin yang dag par gshegs pa sa da bshad pa ma khamal pa la khyim nas byung ba'i mi lags te// mang smad du rung zhes bgyi ba da'i gzhung bya
zi brag ma phyed na/ sangs rgyas kyis byams shing thugs rjes gzigs te/ ba dag la bshad par smonano// sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chubo sems rar/'a nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa// rigs

rgyu kyi bu skra dang kha spu bregs pa ni lus la nga med par gdul ba'i phyir ro/ chos kyi gos gyon pa nu thimal pa 'chos dang dbral ba'i phyir ro// tshul khrimtshang bar 'dzin pan thub cing la gzhig pa'i phyi'i do//
ngas bshad pa de mo tha mal pa'i yin mod kyi/ lus dad sems zul bar nus te/ nga dang le lam g.yo/ sems la rdul gyis ma gos te/ tha mal pa'i chos dang bral nas yun ring sa ta rdo rje dang mtshungs/

tshul khrims kyi ngo bo nyidm leg pas/ thomal pa yin med kyi/ yang dag par na khyim nas byung ba yang dag pa yin no// gang sbel gapa chen pa'i chos kyi yag 'di'i nang na bshad pa bzhin du las su spyad na/
sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang ches pas rtag skyid nga gtsang mthong ste/ sems can la dgrol bshadon/ ma tha mal pa yin mod kyi/ brtan pa bzhi'ominatra/ byang chub sems dpa' las spyod la yon/
blang du med pa ste/ mingan dge bsnyen ces bya// shes rab kyis thabasub ste/ sgrib pachen pa'i chos bshad do/ da lta bu'i chos kyi ngo ba 'di kun sems dang ma bral te/ sems lo sa 'phrul
skyes te/ ting nge 'dzin ma 'o// rtag par gcig pu gcig pu'i sems la gnyis su med do// gcig pu'i sam sa tshaningan phyi nang yang med/ bar ma yod med de thams cad dung yang bral la//
thams cad dang bral naskye ba dang shi kha'ang med do// skye ba dang shi ba med na/ gdod yang dag pa'i mi g.yo ba Anano// yang dag pa'i m g.yo ba rtag par 'dug la// chos dang dge 'dunanamed par mi
'gyur ro/ khams gsum gyi sems carang skyes rang shago/ rigs kyi bu phachad kar sems can la nga med par bshad do// sangs rgyas dang yang dag par gshegs pani yang dag pa'i bden pa'i nga
yin ti/ skyashar 'bab pa las 'das so// khyed la sogs pa sa mas can rnams rtag par 'dug pa tsholan 'dod pa'i rnams dang spangs la/ skye ba med pa'i las byos shig byang chub sems dang/'a
nam mkha' mdzod kyis// sangs rgyas la gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das las ji lta bu spyad de/ mnge skye ba med pas zhes bgyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas/ gis
kyi ba rnams ng las gzhan la skyes n gzhan las nga ma skyego/ ji lto zhes byas na/ tshul gyi de nyid gtsang la stong pa ste// yod pa dang malan/ rtag pa med pa yang ma yin no// yod do
chog kyang yongan stong pa gtsang ma ste/ mdaba'ang ma yin na/ ma thar yang yod pa 'ang ma Anan/ byang chub sam sa dpa' dang/ sangs rgyas yang dag par gshegs pa rnams kyis khong mor ngo bo ni
gcig la spos kyi ro bro bas/ sems can rnams kyi sems gcig gi ngo bo nyid gtsang mar bsang san/ mdzangs pa'i rnams na go lta/ stong par khong durgyud/ blun po'i rnams kyis nang slar ma'i nang du
zhugs te/ tshalags khacings so// ji ltazhag byas na/ sems can shes rab med pa la gti mug med pas tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid yodar/ ma rig pa 'o cog tshor ba'i tshor ba med pa ma g.yo/ stong pa'i ng med/
mi 'gyur ba'ang med de/ gtsang btang ba gcig pu'i nang du chudanas mya ngan cog dang bral to/ sems can skrun panagati mug yod pas tshor ba'i dbo nyid la mtsho bas/ ma rig pa g.yos te
tshor ba med pa/san rtul dngamya ngan thoms cad byas go/ tshor ba yod par shes na tshor ba med pa'i ng med do/ tshor ba med pa'i ng mar nagadod nad kyang mi skyago/ nadam skye na tshor ba yod/
07 pa'od med do// tshor ba yod pa med na yatamachis pa'i sems med do// jil zhes byas na/ 'di ma chagrwa ba'i sems gcig gi nang na 'di rnam gnyis yod do// yid mi ches pa'i
sems med na nad kyang ma skyego/ skye ba'i gnas yod na ni khang pa stong par zhugs go/ gnod gcig gi yang dag pa'i stong pa ni bya ni yod/ gzugs na mid/ 'du byed dang phrad do//
rgyu g.yos pa ni stong pa skya ma dang mtshungs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems can no cog yid machis pa'i sems ni chod par bya ba'i rigs pas// bdag gis sems kyi mkhan po bya bar ston to//
srims kyi sa bdag gso lan pa bya bar n mo smonano// 'dod pa'i rnams dang bral la rang nyam med par byas te/ bsam pa'i gnas skyes kyang/ bsam pa'i semasu med do// snga ma'i
sems dang phyi ma'i sems la cig lagacig la ngas na gzhung bzhin te/ ma rigapa ma g.yo tshord 'gyur ba g.yo med kyi/ phyi ma ma g.ye'i// sems g.yo ba'i tsho pa ma g.yos pa'i
sems kyis dgag go/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas la gsol la/ bcom ldan 'das sems sngon lags na/ sems g.yos pa mchis na chos ci bgyis
pa sa tshorazhing dgag zhus/ sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas/ byang chub sems dpas las spyod pa'i rnams las khor mor sems 'dug pa'i rnam pa rtog tu bcug ste/ sems 'dug pa'i gnas
rig na/ gdod sems ma 'dug go/ de ltar tshol bas natshor bas dgag go/ 'dod pa'i sems ma g.yon dang ga cing brtag pa yang med do// gam kha gnas mdo na stod
pa la bde bar bzhag go/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gcig gnang na gos pa dang/ gtsang na la gnyis ka yang med de// ngo ba nyid gtsang gdang bsan blangs pa'i ng med/ btang da'angand do/ sems
kyang mi skye'o// skyaba'ang med/ spyod pa'i ng med/ lus kyis spyad pa'i gnas kyang med/ tshig smra ba'i lam yang chon/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid nis pa tshor ba'i ngo bo nyidn rtag par yod cing/
dung stong ba dang mtshungs te/ thams cad la mchog sa so/ byang chub sems dpas lag 'di spyad na/ dpe dbyig gu thogs la nam mkha' 'jug pa dang mtshungs te/ phyogani log lta chags pa
med do// de'i zhing ni chos spyod pa zhes khyuko/ chags pa'i gnas yod du zin na phyi nang du zhugs pa yin no/ sa gtsang mar glod cing 'gron sams gtsag ste gnyis su med do khasam gtan du
zhugs la ldang 'dug g sems bkag ste/ nad dag pa'i bden pa gcag la da rtags la 'gyod tshangs khyago/ da'atsho bal mang po'i zhing na log srid nang 'dod mangs zhes bya ba zhig yod pa gnad
thog ma med pa tshun chod lag pa mang du byas te/ ltos pa rtag par byas nas/ ldang ba dang blob dang/ phrag dog dang/ 'gan da ba dang/ 'di rnam bzhi'i sgral gyisanItrengs/ mi brtan pa dang/
phyin ci log gi sems kyi bya ba gnyis kyis na sems kyi rtsa ba bcad de/ dper na ma zhig gang la khe nagar spungs la 'gan sprul ba zhi ba dug ste/ kha gdug pa'i gling grwa pasu ni gyen du gdug//
ngag kha nas byi ba gnyis ni dpyad khral 'di la bzas te chad la thug/ sems gtsang ma gsum nAmid par khyas/ mi'i dang/ khadog dang/ sems dang kun n ma ba dan pa phyin ci log byed
pa ste ma bod bas bcings nas sems can dmyal bar lhung la zug pa la skad cig bsam pa'i sems kyizhingan/ gnod bkur ba'asems g.yos te/ yang dag par gshegs pa la 'gyod
tshangs kyi chos dra lam snyan n pa de la gnong zhing ngo tsha bas 'dris dan/ yang dag par gshags pa'i 'phrul gyi thugs kyis da'i yodi la sems pa mkhyen te/ ma ri sdug bsngal pa las phral te/
sems can dmyal ba'i skyin s dbyung bar zug sa la dgongasanas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam ma kha'i mod la bka' stsal pa// nga'adas te song ba'i phyin 'khog srid pa la la zhig gis las ngan
ba mang du byas te/ sangasargyukyi dkona mchog gsum med par khyad pa de ltabu'i mi ni phyi ma'atus la sems can dmyal ba'i nang du yang dag par lhudunas/ bskal ba chen po bcu gnyis kyi bar du'ang ma
thar ro// khyed byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byams shing sAng+girjespyod la/ sems can 'di lta bu'i rnams 'gyod tshangs byed du chug la/ de'i sems kyi dri ma gtsang gdang bar byos la grol khar
par byas shige/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis/ sangs rgyas la gsol mA/ bcom ldan 'das 'gyod tshangs kyi chos ci bgyisan/ sduge bsal
bar rung ba sang sargyas sa khyan/sa shing thugs rjes gzigs// byabrag phudapar kha yod par smon to// sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' la bka' stsal pa/ 'gyod tshangs byas na
tsha yang dag pa'i bden pa'i che chung la brtagag/ yang dag pa'i gdan pa'i gzhung mthong n sdig go cog thams cad bsal to// sangs rgyas kyisatshig 'di skad bshad na nas/ de'i tshe phal chab
pa brgya stong khri 'bum gyi sems can ma dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa thams cad kun sems gcig tu yang dag pa'i bdan pa'i gcig la brtags te/ mthod zin nas log sred 'dod mangs
mdong zhan stan las langs te/ lus smad lnga sa la gtugs nas/ sangs rgyas la ba so' ra// bcom ldan 'das bdag gsams la marag pamachis/ brtag pa bsrungs med kyi/ yang
dag pa'i bden pa'i gzhung ma mthong do/ glo ma zhes bgyi bam mchis pa tshun chad ngan pa bcu 'ba' zhig gi las bgyisan/ da thabs su spyad n bdag gis skung dag pa'i bden pa 'i gzhung gathong
zhing/ sdig zhu khyud bar gyi'i rung/ sangs rgyas sa/ 'dod mangs la bka' stsal la/ du la sogs pa lag sred kyi rnams kun sems gcig tu byas shag dang/ ngas khyed la bya/
phyed par dgrol bshad do// 'dod 'das khyad la sogs pa sems can gyi rnams kyis lus sems la sangs rgyas kyi btudagacig pu la brtags na chos kyi debatud kyang brtag pa
gcig pu'o/ sangs rgyas so cog la 'ong ngo bo nyid chig pu ste/ gnyis su med pa san yang dag pa'i bden pa'i gzhung Anano// de la gnyis su med da mthong n de'i ming ni in pa nas
bya'o yin pa la lta nan mya ngan 'khrug pa ldangago yon ra ma thang po med na mya ngan 'khrug pa'i ng mi skyoko mya ngan 'khrug pa chod na dbanang gtsang gdung zhes bya'o// khyed
la sogs pa sems can kun gyis sems gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo todi gcig ga bu 'artog cig/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid las gzhan mthong ban yang med do/ gzhan mthong
ba yod du zin na kun kyang skyam ma bden pa yin no// ma bden pa de lta bu byed pan phyin ci log ces bya'o// 'dod mngasasems gcig gtsanganun chos so cog kun kyang gtsang ngo/
sems gcig sna natshos so cog kun kyang sgego/ smra ba'i drim ni sdig yin no/ gtsang man yang dag pa yanin// sems dri ma dang bralanan sdig ma skye'o// 'dod mang sa kyis/
sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gna' nas las ngan pa'i rnams bgyis pa na skal pa stong khri grongasam mchis mu ma mchis pa lon na da ring sems bskyed de/
yang dag pa'i bden pa'i gzhung gcig la brtags na mu ma mchis pa yi sna'i kun byang dam la byang pa sang sargyas kyis ga la ba bshad par smon no/ sangs rgyas
gis/ 'dod mangs la bka' stsal pa// yang dag pa'i bden pa'i gzhung rtogs na sdig to cog kun n byad nga// ji lta phyinus zhes byas na/ 'dod mangs sngon chad ni dri ma'i sems sa//
dan gtsang ma'i sems sa// sems gcig ste gnyis su med dag don sems gzhan med// da radi ga sems gtsang na sngon gyisams kyang gtsang du dalta bas na bskal pa grangs med pa tshun
chad kyi sdige rnams kyang kun byung zhing med par mngon// dare/ran me 'ang lo stong len pa'i nad du mar ma gtsami ga bsregs pa dang mtshung sa ste/ deb mid bzhanasnang ste/ rdul kun phyis nas
lhag ma'ang mu lus pa dang mtshud gas// ya nga ba gcig tu na khang pa mun n ga lo steng lon pa'inang du mar ma gcig bsrel sa pa dang mtshungs te/ mun pa kun mad par sod go/ khyed
sags pa sems kyi rnams rtag par sems gcig sogs yang dag pa'i bden pa'i gzhung gcig long rtags pa'i rigs sa// chos so cog gnang ba las rnams spyad de/ 'jig rten gyi
chos so cog thams cad dang 'bral bar bya ba'i rogs sa// ci'i phyi nas zhes byas na/ 'dod mangs/ 'jig rten gyi chos nagayos kyang rung/ ma g.yos kyang rung ste/ kun kyang mthar
ma/ 'jig cing 'bral ba yin no// chos la 'gog cing ra' na spyad pa 'am rtag pa med de/ chos la skye sha yod par 'gyur ro// skye shi yod pa'i chos dang bral na gdod med yang dag pa'i

gzhung zhes bya'o// 'do mangs dang ranardza mkhan gyis rdza spyad pa dnga mtshungs te/ yid la ci 'dod pa du zhin du byas na spyod bsu 'gyur ba med// spyad cing dang gzugs nar nga skyes shing rungs na//
gyiso'a'id bzhin 'ba' zhig yod do// rad bzhin gcig pu ni rtag par 'dod do// dang gzugs gzhan nan skyes nga shang dngas so// skyos shing dwangs pa'i gzugs ni red skyes pa sku
yin no// rang skyes pa yin na mdod pa ma yin no// 'dod na sa sung su rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ni dpar gyi lde dang na tshung sa sa// san sa can rang bzhin ni dpar snyed dang mtshungs te/ skye shi'i
chos nano// las sa cog dang bra gnas nigasargyus kyi sku lus gcig yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi sku lus gcig la brtags na lus gzhan med do// 'dod na ngas kyan/ sangs rgyas 22 gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das bdag gis yang dag pa'i bdonar 'i gzhung la brtags pas sdug rnams na byang lags na/ ang las ca spyad na chos kyi lus skya bar rang/ sangs rgyas kyis/ 'dod
mangs la dka' stsal pa// yang dag pa'i bden pa'i gzhung la brtags na nad de tsog ma ldangago/ sdig pa dang dri ma kun ma g.yosan/ sems ni rdo rje dang mtshungs ta/ nam du'ang mi
'jig go/ tshul khrims 'byung nusan/ sems nam mkha' dwang mtshud to nang gnyis gtsang gdang go/ bsam gtan 'dus pa'i nang du 'jug pa la
mkhas na sems zhi dab rlud dang/ ma dang mtshungs twA/ las ngan pa'o tsag kun gyis gang bsal te// shes rab la rten pa la mkhas shes rab thob pa b.rung ste/ de'i mngon sprol thar pa
zhus bya/ grol khor pes na yang dag par nga shos shang ma thod bar nus go 'dod na ngas khyod kyis 'dulta bu'i don sgrungs/rimyudazhusan/ chos kyi sku lus rnam ra lnga thog dar rung ngo// 'dod sangs
kyis/ sangs rgyas la gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku lus rnam lngal rgyu dang 'bras bu camatshig sangs rgyas kyis 'dod mangs la bka' stsal la/ sangs rgyas kyi 'o
nyid rtag pa brgya yan no// chos kyi sku lus ni rtag pa'i 'brasabu Anano// ja lA zhes byas na/ sems rgyu na sangs rgyas kyi tir/ chos kyi yun gyis 'bras bu thob go/ rgyu dang 'bras
bu dang bral nargyu'i 'bras bumed do// rgyudang babras bumedAn su dag rgyas kyi lus yang dag pa yin// 'dod mangs sems gtsang ma'i tshul la sems ma g.yo bar sangs rgyas tsho dwapa med
bsams na/ gdod yul gtsang skor skyes M te/ sems can kyi phyi'i mi g.yo chos dadad sams yang dag pa'i stong dazhing du chud la g.yo zhing bshad pa'i rnams dang bral to//
za shes rab gsum gyi ngo bo ni gcig ste rdo rje dang mtshungs par ma 'a ngag go/ de'i tshig la gyi nang na yang byang chub sems dpa'i ming spyod med ces bya ba zhig yod bstan las 'dudas te/
brag pa g.yas pa chos bzhin byas/ pusamagayas pa sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas sang sa rgyas la bse ra// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'das te gshags pa'i
slad na/ lnga brgya 'am 'pho stong ngan/ lo stong lnga brgya na sems can la chos bshad na/ chos gang bshad pa'i rogs pa sangs rgyas kyis byams shing thugs rjes gzigs te
bdag la drang zhing bshad par smon no// sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod med la bka' stsal pa/ gus kyabu de chos kyi rnams dang shad pan mdon shad/ gzungs
