tshe dang ldan pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa// shAr dwa ti'i bu legs so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid la dwags
pa byas la sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o// AranA ti'i bu khyod shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa dag sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa mthong bar 'dod
dam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thamasacad n byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa dag ji ltar sbyin pa sbyin par bgyid pa mthong bar 'tshal lo// de nas

sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwati'i bu dang/ de las gzhan pa'i nyan thos chen po rnams dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis 'di nas thadaka' phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams sgyu ma
@#/ zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas phung po chen po zhes khyu ba nyan thos rnams la chos ston te/ de na byang chub sems/
dpa' thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba khyim na 'dug cing/ khyim na 'dug bzhin du dbyig dang gser gyi phung pa ri tsam sbyin pa sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ste/ 'di las khyer ba'i sems can de
dag la sbyin pa sbyin par gyur cig ces sgrogs so// gosakyi phung po ri tsam dag sbyin par byed do// bza' ba dang bca' ba'i drung pa ri tsam dag sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ sems can gang dag
gis pha ba las khyer ba de dag la sbyin pa sbyin par gyur cig ces sgrogs so// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa// byang chub sems
dpa' thogs pa med pa/sa/ rin da cha sna bdun gyi shing rta babus phrug mang po bkram ste/ shing rtarer la yang bud med kha dog stong gis brgyan pa dag zhonanas/ tshod dus kyi srang du sbyin pa/
sbyin par byed/ tshig 'di skad du gang shing rta 'di dag dang/ bud med 'a dareg 'dod pa des khyer cig ces kyang zer ro// budamed de dag re re ya nga bud med brgya brgyad 'khor dang ldan te/ shing
rta dbyig dang bcas pa// bur med kyi 'khor dang bcas pa bud med de de dag la sbyin par byed cing yongs su gtong ngo// shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med pa sbyin
pa sbyin par mthong dam/ gsa' la// bcom ldan 'das mthong lags go/ ba dbar gshegs pa mthong lags go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shar dwa ti'i bu byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o// danas tan thos chen po da dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus sbyin pa sbyin pa da na/thod ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shAr dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ sbyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin nam/ gsol pa// a la la bcom ldan 'das rgya che ba 'gas so// bcom

ldan kha dus kyis bka' stsal ra// ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa 'di ltar byon zhing yongs subatang pa 'di la ro las gzhan pa'i sbyin pa rnams ni brgya'achar yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du yang mi

bzod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bus sbyin pa du byin nas bde skad du dgekha'i rtsa ba 'diso theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thoms cadoni phyi'i mi
ldog pa nyid du gyur cig/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngos su rdzogs par gyur cig ces yongs suspro/
bar byed pa yang mthong ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di la skyes pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems
dada' gad pa bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa// shAr dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa// sogs/
dang pa bskyed pa 'a gnas pa ni/ dgra bcom pa'i sems las 'da' go/ sems gnyis pa bskyed pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sems las 'dab 'o// phyir mi ldog pa'i sems la gnas pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' ma ngesangashing lung ma bstan pa las 'da' go/ byang chub sems dad 'a byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa nithams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o// shAr dwa ti'i bu gad byang
'tsho chub kyi snying pa la 'dug la/ thams cad mkhyenapa ma thob par de las ldang ba 'din mo srad de/ goskangs ma yin zhing gnas med de/ ma byung 'byung ba'am 'gyur ro// shAr dwa ti'i bu gang gi
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa dazhi/ lha dang dacas pa'i 'jig rten dang/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lham yin//
dung bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying dkol bzhugs so zhes rig par bya'o/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar rab byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen pa brnag pa yongs su rdzogs ra/ blan med pa yad dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba can du gyur pa'i phyir ro// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan
dang ra dwa ti'i bu dang/ nyan thos de dag gisangashar phyogs kyi 'jigarten gyi khams thams cad na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa grangs med pa gang dag byang chub kyi snying ra la 'dug

cing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de dag kyang mthong ngo// byang chub sems dar 'a grangs med pas nga dgarab tu 'byung ba'i phyi'i gdon par 'phyang da
dag kyang mthong ngo// byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang drag khyim na gnas dang/ sbyin gtong pa dag kyang mthong ngo// byang chub sems dpa 'grangs med pa grong dag slong ba rnams slong ba
na/ mag yongs su gtong ba dag kyang mthong ngo// byang chub sems dpa'i grangs med pa gang dag myong ba rnams slong ban/ lus 'di'i sa su bcug ste/ khrag sbyin pa dag kyang mthong go/ byang
chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag bu dang chung ma yongs su gtong ba dang/ khyim gyi dngos ra dang/ zhing gi dngos po rang/ rta dang/ ba glang dang/ bran dad/ bran na da las byed pa dang/ no
shas 'tsho ba rnams nangs su gtod ba dag tshang mthong// byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin byed pa dag kyang mthong nga go/ byung chub sems dpa' grangs
med pa gang dang/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skye ba dag kyang mthong ngo// byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'phos te/ ma'i mngal duslebadag kyang mthong// byang
chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag btsa' ba dang/ chos ston da dgakyang mthong ngo/ byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag sems can rnams kyi ched du
sdug bsngal rnams yang dang yang spyod ga dag kyang mthong ngo// byang chub sems dang 'grongs med pa gang dag sems can rnams kyi ched du dud tshad brgyar yar 'gro zhing/ nyis brgya 'am/ sum brgya
la 'am bzhabargya bam/ lnga pa rgya dam/ dad ga tshad stod ngam/ de las lhag par yang 'gro ba dang/ sems can rnams kyi ched du ji ltar byas na/ sems can 'ga' yang dge ba bcu'i las rgyu lam dag la
gnas par 'gyur bar yang dag pa/ra 'dzin du 'jug pa dang/ yang na gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur par 'di la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par bya ba dang/ yang nabaslab pa'i gzhi gcig 'dzin/
par 'gyur ba 'am/ yang na bslab pa'i gzhi gat+tis sum/ gsum mam/ bzhi ba/ lnga 'dzin par 'gyur ba 'om/ yang na sems can 'ga' yang byang chub la gnas par 'gyur bar yang
dag par 'dzin du 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag gtu'agro ba yang mthong ngo// byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyudag
ginang du rab tu byung nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ni ma zis ma mthong pa dag la byang chub sems dpa' 'di dgan pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ma thos shing mi mthong bas// bskal pa khum dag tu bcom
zhing 'kher te/ kun rang bos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid klob pa dag kyang mthong go/ byang chub sems dar la grangs med pa gang dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams la raro' tu phyin du nas ston

ra na nga mthong ngo// byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag pa rol tu phyin pa rnams tsho'o naa marAdar rtag kyang ma bodang/ byang chub sogs dar ba grangs med pa gang nag ra rol tu phyani ranamu
tshol zhing de dag gis rin pa yang mthong ngo// byang chub sems dpa' das med pa gang dag thon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs ra/ra 'tshang rgya ba dag kyang mthong ng
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa chos ston pa dag kyang mthong// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa gang togabyang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ched du/ bskal pa bye ba
khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang por byang chub tu sems bskyed du 'jug par mdzad pa dgakyang mthong ngo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa gang dag sems can rnams yongs su smin par
mdzad pa dang/ gang dag byang chub tu sems bskyed du 'jug par mdzad pa dag kyang mthong/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med ma/ gang dag sems can gang+gA'i klung gi khyim snyed mangs su sman
par mdzad pa dag kyang mthong ngo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa gang dag 'jig rtenagyi khams grangs med ra dmag tu gshegs nas/ sems can rnams kyi ched du chos ston pa dgakyang
mkhong ngo// de ltar na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams na deka' ba mdzad pa'o/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi ni khrus tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang/ dge slong la dge 'dun gyi se
shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams pa'i klung gi bye ma snyad de dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gnas pa de dag kyang mthong ngo shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad
na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag kyang mthong/ lho phyogs dang/ nub dang/ byang rang/ phyogs mtshams dang/ 'og dang/ steng du yang de bzhin du sbyar te/
da ltar kho ra khor yug tu phyogs bcu'i bar du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa dag ga dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag mthong ngo// de nas tshe dang ldan
pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos rgya chen po dang ldan te/ ji lta zhen/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig
rten gyi khams der/ga tu ma na chis pa dgan/ byang chub sems dpa'i grangs ma mchis pa dag dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grongs ma mchis rad dag mthong ba dang/ de bzhin du lho dang/ nub dang/
byang dang/ 'og dang/ steng dang/ phyog gas mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs ma mchis pa dag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu ma mchis pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma
mchis pa dag mthong ba ni ngomatshar lags so// da nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa/ gyur dwa ti'i dus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam
dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos rgya chen po dang ldan ta ]gang dag gis rgya chen po'a gnas bla na med pa'i byang chutu sems bskyed pa nango mtshar che lags sa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

pa/ kaA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ byang chub senas dang/ 'a sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis 'di ltar branamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems rgya chan gog skyed par bya'o// gsal ru//
bcom ldan 'das mar 'gyur bar 'tshal bas ni/ dpe na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ltar bgyi'o// ltar 'gyur bar 'tshal ra sa ni/ dper na lha rnams kyi dad pa brgya byin ltar bgyi'o// tshe

ring da ya ngos su 'dzin par 'tshal bas ni/ dper na 'du shes med 'du shos med mni skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba lha rnams ltar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de da zhin du 'jig rten gyi sbyin ba gnas su 'gyur

bar 'tshal ba dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'bel bab chos kyi gtam bgyi bar 'atsha' ba dang/ sangs rgyas 'tsha'akhasazhi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed par bgyi//
de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshedang ldan pat+tAsAr tA ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'jig rtenagyi rgyun gnas kyi
mchog tu 'gyur bar 'dod pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed par khya'o/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa'i m dwati'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das//
la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcomo ldan 'das dang pasen sa bskyed pa 'di'i sa gud na/ byang chub sems dang ba sims pa rab chen po'i sems bskyed ra ches bakhong ra 'am/ ches rgya che ba 'ga'
kha lta mchis lags sam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ra// hashar tAti'i bu khyod ra bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la longs su 'dri bar sems pa/
sgyu legs salegs sa// shA ra dwa ti'i bu dgra bcom pa/ba zag pa med pa'i sems gang yin pa re na spyir ba'i sems kyis rang rgyud dang ldan pa'i konAmongs pa rnams spang bar zad kyi/ sems sde
sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi ched du bskyed pa ma yin no// shAr dwa ti'i du byang chub sems ni si mas can dpag tu med pa'i ched du bskyed pa yin gyi/ ti'i sems can rnams kyi phyi'i nam
yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu rang sangs rgyas kyisims kyang rang gi rgyud dang ldan pa/'a nyon mongs pa rnams bzlog dar zad kyi/ byang chub sems ni sems can rur tu med pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams zlog

ra Anano// shA ra dwa ti'abri yang byang chub kyi sems na bsten cing bstan te bsgoms lamad du byas na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug lo rnams kyis zan sa cad mkhyen pa nyid thob// thams cad n khyen pa'i mi shes

thob na/ des nyan thos rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams rab tu phyi'o// gang dag 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ 'di lta ste/ rang byang chub la gnas shing sgamun[】 ]da dag las sangs rgyas bcom ldan/

'das rnams khyed ni rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur taM/ bskal pa bad snyed cig na lha rnams dang/ ma rnyems zhing du mtshams sbyar te/ 'khor nas rang sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro zhes lung ston gyi/ shAr dwa
ti'i bu rang sangs rgyas rnams na byang chub sems dpa' la ma 'od s pa'i dusan/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung ma ston to//
nyan thosa rnams kyang byang chub sems dang 'a la lung ni ston to// gal ta na thos lung ston na yang/ de bzhin gshegs pa las thosanas lung ston to// shar dwa ti'i bu gang gis sems

can thams cad dgra bcom po nyide la bkod kyang/ dos na thams cad la khyen pa nyid mkhongs su bzung ba ma yin gyi/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpi' ra pa rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams kyis/

'domasangashing rjes su ston na/ 'di ltar des ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngas su bzung ba yin no// daci'i phyir zhen/ shar dwa ti'i bu nyan thos las ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus rnams kyi byang chub byung/

ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' las de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ltung ba'i phyire'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las 'jig rtenagyi khams grangs med par byang chub sems dang/'i spyoder//
[S]/ dang sangs rgyas bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// ka/de nas bcom ldan 'das la// tshe dang ldan pa khur dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//

[D21 ]bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dar rar leg par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la spyod pa'i byang
chub sems dar/kha bdin byang chub sems dar ba zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob po// gsol pa/ bcom ldan bdas zag pa ma mchis pa'i sems las/ byang chub kyi sems khyad par du 'phags par
bshad pa 'di'i rin ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar lung bstan ra bzhin du yang dag par gzung bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da/ shar dwa ti'i bu 'di
ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems kha dod chags dang bcas da/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa// gta mu ga dang bcas ra An nam/ gsal ra// bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang bcas pa/
kyi zhe sdang dang bcas pa// gti mug dang bcas pa lags sa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di rje snyam du sems/ dgra bcom pa'i sems 'dod chag gas dang bral ba/
zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba yin nam/ gsal pa// bcom ldan 'das re de ltar lags te/ dgra bcom pa'i sems 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang
[4]dang bral ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shar dwa ta'adu 'di ji snyam dusems/ gal te dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/sa sems can dpag tu med pa rnams 'du byamasu da dung
sAng rjes khyab par byas kyang/ de'i tshe sems can de dag bde bas tshig rar 'gyur ram/ gser ra/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar dgra bcom pa na thabs lamakhas pa ma mchis na/ sems can
dad ga tu ma mchis pa rnams la byas pas ji ltar khyab ra/ra dgyo/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar ji srid du mnyam par gzhag pa de srid kyi bar der byams pa des kha cig ni bde bar 'gyur/ khacig
ni sdug bsngal bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyidi thob pa re'i sems kyi skad cig la// byams ra la gnas shing byams po mngon par
sgrub pa ma 'gas mod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das gnas ma mchis pa nan gyis dper bgyis te bshad par bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te 'dzam bu'i gling 'ding bdag dang 'dra bar rnam par thar pa brgyar
li bsam gtan pa sha stag gis gang bar gyur la// de dag kyang byams pa la soms ra ra zhugs sam// gal te snyoms pa/ ra 'jug par 'tshalan ang snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'os ma lags so//
bcom ldan ba das kyis bka' stsal pa// shAr dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang zag pa med pa'i sems las/ byang chub sems dpa' sems mchog ces bya ba nas// gong na med ra zhes bya
ba'i bar du'o// shAr dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang gal te sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa sha stag tu gyur la/ dgra bcom pa re res
kyang bdud kyi sde 'khrugs med 'khrugs med sIr mngon par sprulan/ shAr dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'khrugs med de dag mang ba yin nam/ gsal pa// bcomA ldan 'dus mang lags
'a sa// bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shAr tA ti'i bu 'di jisnyam du sems/ dgrabcom pa de dag dang/ dpung de dag gis phyir mi ldog pa'i byung/
chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems de bzlog par nus sam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ranam lags/sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shar dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sem
sen sa de gnyis kyi nang na gang mthuche/ sems can thams cad zag pa zad ra ragyur pa rnams kyi zag pa med pa'i sems gang yin pas thu cha 'am/ phyir mi ldog dra ba byang chub sems nara'i
kyi sems mthucho 1 gsob ra// bcom ldan 'das byung chub sems dpa' sems ches masgyu cha lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// phyir ma ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byang
chub kyi sems ches mthu che ba yin te/ Ar dwa ti'i bu zag pa med pa'i sems kyis bdud kyi sde 'khrugs med dpag tu med ra rdzu 'phrul gyis ma don par smralan yang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i
sems kyis 'dod chags dang bcas/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa// gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems yongs su gtugs par ma nus so// shar dwa ti'i bu ba de rje snyam du sems sems ba de deb ka sa kenang na/
sems gad mchog ces bya ba nas// gong na med pa zhes bya ba'i bar du gang yane/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das phyiram ldeg pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems mchog ces bgyi ba nas/ gdan
ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar du lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar zag pa ma mams rang sems kyis gtugs par bgyir ngo tshu thog pa'i slad du'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang khyod
nyide la yongs su dri bar byas/ khyed kyis ji ltar bgrod pa da bzhin du lan thob cig/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di jo snyam du sems/ gal temaching bu'anor bu dag gnad du nor bu rin po chapa rlu bzhag
na/ci'i mchid dubazhir du de dag gis nor bu rin po chab cha chu 'kha gsal ba dang/ rin thang gis thub khag/ gsob/ pa/ bcos ldan 'das da nim pags so// mching ba'i nor bu dag gi phung po chen pos/
nor bu rin po che pe zlarma gcig spyad khril gyis mnan par rjen thog lugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de ci'i phyir/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das mching bu' nor bu de dag ni yongs
su dag pa yang ma 'o lags/ kha rog bzang dang yang ma lags/ rin thang yang chud la// brjod par yang nus pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mching bu'i nor bu ni kha nas rgya chen po nas byung ba yang ma lags
so// bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che ba lhurman rigs kyis 'phags ra la gas te/ sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nus byung ba lags/
tre/ da ni mching bu'i nor bu mang pos rnga'i gyis gnon pa/rarjomatholog go/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa// shAr dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin taM/ phyir mi ldog la 'a byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
btsa chen du 'asims ni rten thos thams cad kyis sems zil gyis non par 'dug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang 'di yang dag par gzig gas nas/ phyir ma ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sen
darab chen po'i sems mchog nyid du bzhag pa nas/ gong na med pa nyid kyi bar du bzhag pa yin no// nyan thos dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems gang byams pa dang ldan

da dung 1 sang rje dang ldan dod ang zad par byed ma nus sato/ shA ra dwa ta'i bu dgra bcom pa zil ga pa zad pa mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa de dag gis kyang/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'jig rten gyi khams
gzhan du rdzu 'phrul gyis 'bad par nus mod kyi/ phyir ma ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems na zad par ma nus so// shAr nAti'idu dgabcom pa zag pa zad pa mngon ra ra shes pa drug rlung ldan ra
dadag gis kyang/ rgya mtsho chen po kha'i dbugs kyis bskam ra ra nus mod kyi/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems ni zil gyis mnan pa bam/ zad por byed ma

nus so// shAr dwa ti'i bu dgra bcon pa zag pa zad pa mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed sreg pa'i me yi phung po chen pa de yang kha'i/
dbugs kyis gsed par nus mod kyi/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dad 'a sams dpa' chen po'i sems n hril gyis mnan pa ba ma/ zed par byed ma nus so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs 'dis

ni/ phyir ma ldog pa'i byang chub sems dung ba sems dpa' chen pa'i sems mchogaces khya/ gtso bo dang/ phul dang/ rab dang/ ra ba mchog dang/ dran med pa nas/ gongan med pa zhes bya ba'i de ra du nga rjod
do// daskad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ tshe dang ldan po bar dwa ti'i bus// bcom ldan 'das la bdaskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du gyur ma ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems rang/'a
chen dang sems rgya che zhing zad par bgyi ba 'am/ bzlog par ma nus pa ngomatshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shar dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// daci'i phyir zhen/ shA ra dwa
ti'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gnyis su ma gsung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams na gnyis su med par gsung zhung/ de bzhin khon ste/ gzhan du ma yin no// shAr dwa ti'i bu gal
te 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pakodakrung gabyi ma snyed kyi sems can gzhan dag byung bar gyur la/ sa'i kham sa ji snyed pa dang/
@#// rlung gi khams ji snyed ra de snyed kyi sems can gzhan dag byung bar gyur na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems// sems can de dag ma nga ba yin nam// gsol pa// bcom
ldan 'dus mang lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems can de dag kyang mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan par gyur

tsha te/ rer zhing 'di ltar mdu 'gal gyi bu chen po lta du rdzu 'phrul dang ldan par gyur la/ rdzu 'phrul can de dag gis 'di ltar sems can de dag ji snyed pa da snyad kyi bdud sdig can mngon par sprul te/
sdig can re re la yang sems can de dag ji sAd pa dasAd kyi nga ro rna'i tshogs yod pa dang/ rta'i tshogs dang/ shing rta'i tshogs dang/ dadu du bu chung gi tshogs yod par gyur/ bgrang ba 'di lta bu'i

tshul gyis dgra bcom pa rdzu 'phrul can de dag ra ras spu'ang ra byed pa'i sprul pa de dag de res kyang de bzhin du sprul pa mngon par sprulan/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni ji snyam du sems/ de dag bgrang ba las
u0fc4 'jug par nus sam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan redas de nam las sa// bcom ldan 'das kyis boka' stsal lu sems can de dag gis phyir mi ldog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
kyi bum pa dag gang na gnas pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rtan gyi khams bsreg par mngon par sprab dag byed na/ nAhAr da ti'i bu 'didzo snyam du sems/ ci sems can ded la rdzu 'phrul/
xxx
sa dbcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te de dag 'dzagi rtenagyi khams mthub yas mu med ro'i gad+madaklong gcu ma snyed kyi bskal par gnas la/ de ltar 'jigs pa/
drag po kun nas ston khyad/ phyir ma lcog da/ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pad dag gsams cad da ra bya ba 'am/ zab rgyas mnan pa 'am/ bzlog nus pa'i skal ba med do//
gar dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems can dpag tu med pa de dag dang/ bdud sdig can de dag gi rdzu 'phrul gang san pa dang/ phyir ma ldog pa'i byang chub sems dwapa'i rdzu 'phrul gang
yin pa ba dganyis la// gang chos mthu dang ldan pa yin/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul dang ldan po 'di dag gi nangan/ phyir ma ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po'i rdzu 'phrul dang/ sems 'don chos mthu dang ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu bad ji snyam du sems/ 'di lta bu'i sde 'phrul dang stobs
gang yin pa da na chog byed pa 'am/ mchog tu 'byung bar 'os pa yin nam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshol ba ltar na/ rnam grangs 'di/
@#// na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma za tog sa par/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems mchog ces bgyi ba nas// gong na ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ste/ de ci'i
slad du zhin/ byarim ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni zad par bgyir rjen thog pa'i slad du lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces

a nga' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ phyi ma lhag pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni zad par byar ma nus sogs sbyin pa'i rol tu phyin pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i re'u
tshu ste bdun ra'o/// donasatshe dang ldan par byams ma'i bu gang posaM/ tshodang ldan ra bar rA ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshodang ldan pa ltar da ti'i bu rnams grangs gang gis
na( phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang bachen po'i si mas bud par byar mi nus/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dar ba chen po sbyin pa gang
dwang gang sbyin pan/ de thams cad thams cad mkhyan pa nyid la dmags nas sbyin par byed/ dbas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems khrad par bya ba 'am/ zil gyis mnan par

mi nus so// tshodang ldan pa gang pa dper na skyes bu tshong pa zhig 'ong 'bum phrag mang po spyod cing de tshong byed la/ tshong pa des tshong dpon nam/ ded dpon gang yang rung ba las/ lo ba bum phrag
mang po zhig nas bskyin pa blangs pa la sa/ dbatshong ma rung bar gyur nas/ des rgyal pa la bskor te/ rgyal po'i gan du song ngo// de rgyal po'i ri lung des na/ rgyal pos yongs su bzung ba'i ma dal//

tshong dpon re dang/ don dpon des tshugs par ma bgyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ de ltar de dpyad dang ldan pa'i phyogs 'di lta ste/ rgyal po'i phyogs dpung dang ldan pa'i phyogs de la brten pa'i phyir ro//
tshe dang ldan pa gad pa de bzhin du/ dang po byang chud tu sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i sems nang/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni da pud rung
ldan pa'i phyogs bag rtan to// de ci'i phyir zhon/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyogs dpung dang ldan pa'i phyogs de la brten pas na/ danyan thos thams cad gyis zil gyis gnon par mi
nus so// tshe dang ldan pa gang pa dper na skyes bu rgyal ral la brtan pa ni longs spyod zad pa/ra gyur kyang/ 'on kyang tshugs par ma nus pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dar la sems dpa' chanapa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyogs la brten da yang/ 'di ltar nyan thos thams cad dang/ bdud thams cad gyis mi tshugs so// smras pa/ tshodang dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ltar na byang chub sems

dpa' nyan thos thams cad kyis tshugs par 'gyur/ smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa gang pa gal te nyan thos kyi sa bam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi so sgrogs shing 'chad pa na/ de'i sems bskyadatsadi ba dag kyang da ltar
gyur cig ces sems bskyed na/ nyan thos rnams kyis tshugs pa an no// gang de'i gtam gyi ro myang bar byed pa dang/ de la yang dga' bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'/
na tshul bzhines 5na pa yid la khyadar/bskyed pa res na tshugs par 'gyur// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu/ daci'i phyir na/ de dag la tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa zhes bya/
smras ru// 'di de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thoms can mkhyen pa nyid la bgegs byed pa yin te/ 'di dag skyed par byed pa ma yin la// 'di dang gan thims cad mkhyen pa ring bar byed

pa in te/ de bas na 'di dag na byang chung sa nas dar/'a tshul bzhin ma Ane pa de la byed pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang pa dper na rnal 'khyog pa rnal 'byor spyod pa yang dag dang mtha' mngon sum du rgyu

bar 'dod cing/ yang dag pa la nges par 'jug par 'dod pa'i 'a dod chag dang/ zhesnang dang/ gti mug kun tu 'byung ba nadegra bcom pa nyid rang bar byed pa An te/ de dag de'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed

rgyu pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang por bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzom gas par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa'i thoms cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang
nyan thos dang ldan pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yidi la byed pa rnams bgegs byed pa yin te/ yid la byed pa de dag bskyedan/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dang/'a sems dpa' chen
pa nyan thos rnams kyis brale rgya sa mo pa an no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos rnamAs kyis zil gyis skyon da yin te/ gang nyan thos dang
ldan pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ba e de la khyer du bskyed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ yid la byed pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya

ba'i grangs su ma chud pa'i phyir ro// tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na rgyun du zhugs pa rtonamadas pa kun tu spyodan/ sbyin gnas su ma 'gyur te/ gal te gang gis ra'i nyon mongs pa rnams spong ba'i
shes pa thob na/ des de'i rgyun du zhugs ra zhes bya bar rang tu phye ba yin gyi/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyis rab tu phye ba ni ma yin te/ de ltar na shes pa/ yongs su shes pa dang/ srung ba la 'dris/

pas// da rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhAn du byang chub masu dar kha nyan thos dang ldan pa 'am ]rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems kun tu spyod cing skye bas//
byang chub sems dpa' zhes rab tu phye ba ma yin gyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las brtsams pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i gang dag yin pa de dag skye bas/ 'di lta ste/ da byang chub sem
der/'a zhes bya bar rab tu phye ba yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la gnas ni tshugs par ma nus so// chodang ldan pa dper na ba stong gi slob dpon na gnas na 'dug kyang rung/
bgro yang rung/ dgra rnams kyis tshugs ra/ra dka' ba yin te/ gzhan gyi mdab yang gcod cing bdag kyang bsrung ngo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwati'i bu de bzhin du byang chub se/

dpa 'i byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa yang tshugag ra/'a dka' do// nyan thos kyi spyod pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zos na yang/ 'di ltar bdag kyang myur ba nyid du sman med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa/rasangs rgyas nas// 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag ra ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kya thub pa da ltar nyan thos rnams 'du chos
ston pa da bzhin du/ bdag kyang nyan thos rnams 'chos ston par gyur cig ces yongs su sngo bar byed do// mo dang ldan pa de ltar na thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub son/sa dpa' byang chub kyi sems la
gnas pa ni tshugs par ma nus te/ nyan byes kyi gtam mam// rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam zlos na yang/ chos kyi gtan 'di ni de ba zhin gshegs pa las byung ngo zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa dran

par byed de/ nyan thos rnams la chags pa mi skyed do// tshodang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chud kyi sems la gnas pan thub par dka' ba yin no// tsha dang ldan pa dpe/ narnal 'byor/

pa rnal 'byor spyod pa dmigs pa thob cing ting nge 'dzin legs par bsgoms pa'i sbyor/ rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis mi tshugs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dmigs pa de la rab tu la goms pa'i phyir ro//
dang ldan pa gang da/gal te byang chub sems dpa' thub par dka' bar rig par byan theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa gang dag yin pa rnams dang/ phyi'i maldog pa gang dag yin pa rnams dang/ byang chub kyi/
snying po la 'dug pa gang dag yin pa thams cad r// smras pa/ tshonAng ldan pa shAr pAti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang thub par dka' ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhen/ byang chub sems
dar 'du dag dam bcas pa las bskyed minus te/ de ltar na byang chub bdems rar 'dam bcas pa la gnas pa dang/ byang chub sems 'di gnas pa de dgan thams cad kyang thub par dka' ba yin

no/ tshe dang ldan pa/pagyur dwa ti'i bu dang ran byang chub sems dad/'di ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang yin pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khyi ba brgya phrag mang po nas mngon pa/ra rdzogs par
sangs rgyas te/ bzhugs shing gzhes pa gang yin pa de gnyis g.yung thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
gang yin pa dang/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang/ byang chub kyi snying pal 'dug pa'i phying chub sems dpa' thama' sems thob pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni 'di lta ste/
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid a de la byed pa rnams kyis mnyam mo// smras ra// tshe dang ldan pa la gang po 'di dag ji ltar khyad du ramed/ smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
byang chub kyi sems 'dan khyadar/ramed da/ 'on kyang mgyogs bul gyisan khyad pa/ra yod do// sems de gnyis kan na nyam ste/ gang zhen/ byang chub tu mngon par sgrub pa gang dag yin/
@# rnams sa// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems la gnas pa ni tshe ldog go/ dgra bcom pa dang dgra bcom pa nyidi las ldog la/ zag pa med pa'i sems las kyang

zla ldogon/ de dgra bcom pa nyid du rig par bya 'am/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ni ma yin te/ dan lhag pa'i nga rgyalacan yin par rig par bya'o// smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin
du byang chub sems dpa' byung chub sems dpa'i sems las phyarim u0f7aldolag pa gang yin ra dan byang chub tu khas 'chadar zad da/ den byang chub sems dang 'o ma in gyi/ dan byang chub sems dpa'
sun 'byin pa yin te/ dan byang chub sems dpa' zhabya bar rig par bya bam yin no// smras pa// tshodang ldan pa gad pa de de bzhin no// ra de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa gang pa dper na mi zhig pho

mtshan dang ldan par gyur te dbang pa mtshang ba ma yin pa las/ phyis de'i pho mtshan mar par gyur la/ mo mtshan gyi bya ba byed ma nusan/ de ni ma ning zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang
pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sems smugs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i grangs su ma 'gro'i// sprin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las byang chub sems dpa' yongs su sbyang bar bya ba'i
'u ste brgyud pa'o////de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gad pas/ tshe dang ldan pa shAr tA ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub
sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa/rardzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ yidi la khyen pa ji lta bu bskyed par bya/ smras pa// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan/
pa'i yid la byed pa bskyed par bya'o// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la gnas pa yin no// de ltar gnas pa'i khyong chub sems dpakhazhi sbyin pa gang dang gang

sbyin pa daThams cadu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs suslobur byed do// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngon// sbyin pa'i sha rob tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin no// gal te de ltar yongs su sngo bar

mo byadan/ deb ni sgron pa yin gyi/ sbyin pa'i nga ro'o tu phyin pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa gang dpogazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang sbyin pa sbyin pa na rnam par rtog ste/ bdag gis cung zad ni engs subatang
la/ cung zad n songos su ma gtong ngo zhes rnam par rtog par byed cing/ ba da ni bdag gis sbyin par bya/ 'di'i rgyun par mi bya'o/ 'di la ni sbyin/ 'di'i ni mo sbyin zhes rnam par rtog par byed de/
ngan pa ni sbyin pa bya/ bzang po na sbyin pa'i makhya/ tshul khrims can la ni sbyin par bya/ tshul khrims 'chad pa lan sbyin par mi bya'o zhes rnam par rtog par byed na/ rnam/
par rtog pa 'di dagazhi byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bar chad byed ra Aneno// de ltar rnam par rtog pa ni yun de mo zhig gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyuro//
bdag unarang ma zhes gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma 'gyur grang zhes rnam par rtog par ma bya'o// thams cad la mnyam par gtong zhing sems mnyam pa ni myur du thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// tshodang ldan pa gang pa byang chub sems dpa' rlan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabar 'a dod pa/sa// de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol
tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o// sbyin pa khril gyis mnan te/ sbyin pa'i Na rob tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ sems can gang+gA'i
klug khyim snyedu pha zan byin 'a// zan khros pa'i 'og tu sems can de dag la/ gser gyi dong tse dang/ ras bcos du zung dung/ gser thams cad kyi res byin la// de bzhin du nyi ma gung dang/

ma red dang/ de bzhin du mtshan monan gyi cha stod dang/ de bzhin dunam gyi gung dang/ de bzhin dunam gyi cha smad kyi thun la/ sems can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la zan byin la/ de bzhin du sbyin
ba0 ba yang satwA/ bskal pa gad klung gi bye ma snyed du gnas shing/ de bzhin du yod sa su gtong yang/ ji ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs khasteganabya ba nangeshesan/ da ngan sbyin pa/
yin gyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// ji ste yongs su bsngo ba shes na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i sa 'og tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa gzhano/ rAn byang chub sems dpa'i

tshadan mang du yongs su gtong bas yin no// de ci'i phyir zhan/ 'di ltar de tshad med pa'i chos thob par 'dod cing/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang thob par 'dod na/ tshad dang ldan pa'i yongs su gtong

das thams car na khyen pa nyid thob par nus pa'i phyir ro// gal te sbyin par tshad nges par gyun/ sbyin pa'i nga ro' tu phyin pa ma yin gyi/ gang gi phyi'i sbyin pa ra tshad ngesad ma yin pa ra 'a phyir/

sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa gang do ra ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan pas tshad nges pam yin pa'i sbyin pa sbyin ra/'a bya'o// de nas phyis kyang yongs su gtang
bar bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su gtang bar bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ron thabs des na/ ser sna tshar gcod cing/ thams cad n can pa nyid yongs su 'dzin no// de yang ba de ltar bdag gis sbyin pa/

dpag tu med pa sbyin par bya ste/ gang gi tshaban med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyurakyi bar du sbyin ra rakhya'o// sman med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i khyong chub
mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang/ zang zing med pa chos kyi sbyin ra/sa sems can rnams la ranag dgags par bya'o/ de ltar na ji srid du byang chub tu spyod pa'i bar du krung
zing ga ga nan gdags par bya'o/ blun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas du nani/ rdzong gi med du/chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams la phan gdag
bar bya'o snyam du sumag da skyed do// tshe dang ldan pa bod pa dper na ma zhig rgyal pa la bstan te/ de rgyab phyogs la bstan cing 'khor la// bsnyen bkur byas pas/ rgyal ba rag ra pa zan sbyin
zhing/ des zang bring gi sbyin pa sa phan 'dogs te/ des bsten cing ra skor te/ bsnyen bkur byas pas// rgyal pad mnyes shing dgyes par gyur nas// rin po che brgya stong du ma bskon pa de bzhin
du/ tshe dang ldan pa gang ra/byang chub sems dar 'a rlan med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod da/sa da/ byang chub tu spyod pan// mas can dpag tu med
bal zang zing gi sbyin pas phan 'dogs shing/ blanamed ra yang dag pa/ra rdzogs pa'i byed chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyad/ brang 'ang med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams la
'doms shing rjes su ston ti/ sems can dpag tu med pa dag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams las gro'akhar byed do// tshe dang ldan pa dang do rar nargyal pa'i khyi zhig yoda'// mi mang gang dag
gis rgyal po'i bu de la bsten cing bskor te/ bsnyen bkur byed na/ rgyal po'i bu des bsten pa'i sa de dag thams cad la kha zas g.yos pas phan 'dogs par byed do// jatsim nargyal de'i bu de rgyal//

sudi la gnas pa'i dus 'dab ste/ rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur zhing/ rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba thod da datshe/ da'i zhabs 'bring rid du gyur pa gang yin da de dag la 'di dag ni de dag gzhon nu'i sa la
gnas pa na/ bdag gis sbyangs shing/ bdag gare byas pa ni/ ba dag kyang 'di de gis sbyangs shing/ bdag gir byas pa yin gyis/ bdag gis ma de ni rtag 'khongs spyod la ci rigs par dgodado
snyam ste/ des bdag gis 'khor rnams kha cig ni grong khyer dag tu sna bor bcug/ kha cig na las kyi sna dgag tu/ kha cig natshong dus dag tu/ kha cig na 'or gyi grong dag tu bskos/ kha cige lan grong

dam pa longs spyod du byon// tshe dang ldan pa gang ra der zhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dar ba chen po glan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon dar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas
kyang byang chub kyi phyi'i spyod pan/ sems can dpag tumed pa dag la phan 'dogs te/ zang zing gi sbyin pa gos dang/ zas dang/ mal cha dang/ stan dang/ nad gsos dang/ sman brodo dag gis
lana' dogs taM/ ji ltar rgyal po gzhon nu des// 'khor de dag la zas g.yos pa/ bza' ba dang bca' ba ci byon pa dag gis phan 'dogs pa de bzhin du/ tshe dang ldan pa gang pa byang chub sems
dpa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas kyang/ sems can rnams la zang zing gi sbyin pas na dgas shing/ gang gi tshid bla na med pa yang dag pa/ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub ]

mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur te/ bdud rtsi'i rang du bskur ba thob pa na/ blo ji lta ba dang/ shag la ji lta ba bzhin du drang zingamed ra/ba chos kyi sgron pa/sa 'doms shing rjes su ston to//
'a brang khridi med da/'i chos kyis 'don ngashang rjes su ston rad na kha cig ni rig bcom pa nyid la 'god/ kha cig na phyir mi ldog ra'i 'bras bu la// kha cig ni lin cig phyir 'ong da na bras bu la//
kha cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'a// kha caganab zed pa'i sa la ba god/ kha cig na mthong ba'i sa ba/ khacig ni dge ba bcu'alas kyis sa la 'god par byed do// tshe dang ldan pa

ba gang pa ji ltar rgyal pa ba bu de gang gi tshe rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bsten pa/'a ni de dag ci'og sa ra ra 'das spyod la 'god ra da bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen pa yang bla numad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangasargyusanas/ sems can rnams ji ltar mos pa bzhin du 'god par byed de/ da ltar byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa byung chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can rnams kyi nya bar 'tshong yin zhing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
05/sangs rgyas nas kyang/ sems can rnams mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'god par byed do// de ltar na byang chub sems dad/'a sems dpa' chen pobyang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyodar// sems
can nams kyi te bar 'tsho ba yin zhing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang/ sems can rnams kyi nyi bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// yongs su
mya ngan las 'dus nas kyang/ sems can rnams kyi te bar 'tsho dar 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa gang ra dper na na zhigargya' pa la bsten ta bsnyan bkur byed na/ de'i tshe rgyal po dos zas dang gos kyi
bgo skal byin nas/ gang gi tshig des rgyal dang de la shas cher bsten pa de'i[& ]/ rgyal po dam nyes shing dgyes par 'gyur te/ da thugs 'das par gyur nas/ ges dang rgyan brgya stong du ma bskon te/

longs spyod kyis rgyas par byed do// tshe dang ldan pa gang po da bzhin du byang chub sems dar ba sems dpa' chen ra than me tra pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma yin pa'i rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
bar 'dod pas kyang/ byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/ sems can dar gtu na da pa rnams la sbyin ra/sa phan 'dogs par byed cing/ de bla na med ra yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang chub ma ngon par
rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang/ grang ba'i nad ra/'chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams la 'domasangashi nga rjes su ston te/ 'khor ba las sgrol bar byed do// de skad ces smras pa dang/ tsho dang
ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang des// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwati'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan ra shur dwa ti'i bus ji ltar bshad pa de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa dang ra na ma//
gang dag gser gyi 'byung khung de'i nyen koran gnas pa'i sems can rnams na gseragyi 'byung khung des nams kyang nye bar ma 'tsho bar ni 'gyur te/ gang ga tshi la gsar du brkos shing/ phyung nas ri de

khom lon pa de'i tsho shing sems can rnams kyi nyi bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ gang tsheshin tu drim med par byas shing/ 'ashin tu sbyang sanas steng 'o byas te/ phyung ba dang tsho yang sems can rnams kyi
'bar 'tsho ba yin no// gang gi tshe ba byung khung de nas bton nas bzhus te/ de nas sum cha'am/ bzhi cha gser du gyur pa de'i tshayang sems can rnams kyi nya ba'i 'tsho ba yin no// tshe dang ldan pa
! bur dwa ti'i bu der zhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ang nams kyang sems can rnams kyi te da ra 'tshob ma min par mi 'gyur to/ byang chub kyi phyi'i spyod pa na yang nye bar
[£ ]'tsho ba yin/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par 'dod na yang/ sems can rnams kyi te bar 'tsho ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyan me dar yang dag par rdzogs pa ba byang chub mngon par
rdzogs par sangs rgyas pan yang/ sems can rnams kyi nyi bar 'tsho ba yin/ mkhongs su mya ngan las 'das da ni yang/ sems can rnams kyi lto bar 'tshob yin te/ rgyu 'i de deg gnatan thos
dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med do// rgyu des n byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen go na mchog ces bya/ go bo dang/ shul dang/ rab dang/ ra bo mchog dang/ gya nom pa dang/
bla na med pa dang/ gong na med pa zhes khyug/ danas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen bde chachen dko bas ga dang/ theg chen dol zhugs pa dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa rdzogs pa dang/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/
gnas brtan A ra dwa ti'i bus ji skad bshad pa bzhin du zung zhig/ chongs shagi/ kun chub par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra ta'abu
dang/ tshe dang ldan pa khyams na bu gang pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ nyan thos chen po de dag dang/ lha dang/ sa dang lha ma yin dang/ dri brar bcas pa'i 'jig rten
gi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsudas pa la mngon par bstod do// sbyin pa'i rol tu phyin pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o/// sbyin pa'i ba rob tu phyin pa//
rdzogs so///bam pa gsum pa/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'dan/ rgyal bu rgyal
byed kyi la mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga pa/cu'i dge slong gi dag nan chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa// zag pa zud pa// nyon mongs pa ma da pa
dbang dang ldan par gyur pa// sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par khrel pa// cang shes pa/ glang po chen m/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas ra/
khur bor ba// de dag gi don rjes su theg pa// srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa// yang dag pa'i ngesher/ pas sems shin tu cha grol// sems can thams cad la rang nga dam pa'i pha ro'
sgyu tu phyin pa sha stag dang/ phyog gas bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po rnams dang pas ci'i tu bzhugs te/ gzhan yang gzi brjid chob ga'i
brjidi che ba lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri bro dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mang ma ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po rang/ ma dang/ mi ma yin rang rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing
tshe nadun gyis bltas nas// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dza rob tu tshan ra drug pa ba didel/ ti ra rin8no 'a/kher pan datso yag 5 chos ston no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang

ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dar 'a chen po bla na med pa yang dag ra/ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa/
rnams kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te/ khyod spyogs par gyis shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das las skabs phye ba thob nas// gad//
rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos/ tshong
ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shAr tA ti'i bu ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan par 'ag par bya/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshub//
khrims 'chal par rig par bya/ byang chub sems dar ba rnams kyi spyod yul ni gang yin/ spyod yul ma yin pa ni gang na/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus
tshe dang ldan da byams ma'i bu gang ra la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa gang da u0f7c 'di la gal te byang chub sems dwapa'i nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed/
pa rnams kyi gnas na/ 'di ni byang chub sems dar 'i spyod yul ma yin pa'o// de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshul khrims 'chal ba yin par rig par bya ste/ 'di ni byang chubs

dpa'i spyod yu'adug pan pa 'ang spyod pa'o// 'di byang chub semu dpa' tshul khrims kyi parol tu phyin rang yodas su ma 'dzin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs sum 'dzazhin/ byang chub sems
dpa'i dag bcas rag spang ngo// byang chub sems dpa'i dam bcas pa spongan/ tshul khrims 'chad pa yin par rig par bya'o// tshodang ldan pa gang ra gzhan yang gal te
byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa ni/ nyan thos kyi sa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs susngon/ spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod do// spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod na/ de tsam gyis na
tshul khrims 'cha'/ par grwa pa bya'o// gal te byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas shing/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la 'khongs spyod pa tsam gyisan ]da tshul khrims 'char ra ra rag par bya
( bam un gyi/ gang sbyin pa sbyin zhing/ nyan thos kyis dang/ rad sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngo na/ da tsam gyis na tshul khrims 'chal pa an pa/'dag par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang ra tapa/
nargyal po'i bu rgyal pos gdams pa'i tshim bzhin du byed pa zhig yod la/ rgyal rigs rnams rgyal pa'i khus bslab par bya ba bzo'i gnas 'di ltar blang la tsha'aganya' par bazhon pa 'am/ rta/
tshe bzhon pa 'am/ shing rta bzhon pa 'am/ ral gri khribs sam/ 'dong ngam/ mda' bo che'aphang ba'i me pas/ sam/ brgyug pa 'am/ 'gom pa 'am/ mchong ba 'am/ stabs 'gyed pa 'am/ dgra/
thabs sam/ de la 'bo gas pa'i bze ri dag bslaban/ rgyal po la daden pa yin te/ rgyal pa yang sma dbab par mi sems so// tshe dang ldan pa gang mdo de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' khyim na ba gnas te/
0/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis rtse zhing dga' na dga' dgur spyod du zin kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' nan cams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dan 'dagos pa de dugyur pa yin no// gal te sangasbyin
pa sbyin pa ni/ nyan thos sam/ 'dasangs rgyas kyis 'dus su bsngon/ de tsam gyis na spyod yul ma yin pa la spyad pa yin te/ bdag nyid thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi zhing dum red khar khyod

do// ji lta ji ltar bdag nyid zhing du mu rung bu rad pa de lta de ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma 'dzin no// ji lta ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma 'dzin pa de lta
de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ma byed de// dan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma yin pa 'a spyod pa yin no// rebaspyod yul ma yin da gang yin pa da tid ni/ ra'i tshul khrims 'cha la pa Ani/
no// tshe dang ldan pa gang ratso gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gal te khyon dang khyim gyi gnas nas byung bar cur ta/ de yang tshul khrims gang dang gang yang dag par bzung nas/ gnas pa de
yad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bstanu/ byang chub sems dpa' rten byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa na yin no// gang byang chub sems dor/'i tshul khrims
dang ma ldan pa ra ga byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya'o// gal te byang chub sems naro/'a khyim na gnas shing/ gsum la skyabs su song bar gyul/ de ade thams cad mkhyen ra/
nyid du yongs su bsdon/ de 'dod pa ltar yon tan rnams la longs spyod du bris kyang/ da tsam gyis na de byang chub sems dar ba tshul khrazhes/ gnas// tshul khrims dang
ldan pa zhes bya'o/ byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims la gnas ra tani/ tshul khrims kyi dam ro 'atu phyin pa dang ma bral ba tshuneno// gang tshul khrims kyi pha rob/
a tu phyin pa dang bra' ba don/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral ba zhes bya// gzhan yid byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa dang ldan pa tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i 'od la byed pa rnams 'byung
du zin kyang/ de dag thams cad mkhyen ra ade la byed pa'i sems gcig gis bril gyisanon par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa gang pa gzhan yang nor bu rin pa che ba rdzun na mching bu'i nor bu 'bum
dag dang lhan cig tu bsus te bzhag na/ nor bu rin pa cha ba chub rin thang med ra dang/ kha dog bzang da dung/ 'od kyis mching bu'i nor bu de dag thams cad bral gyis gnonano//
rgyudang ldan pa gang pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa Ad la byed pa de dag thams cad kyang/ thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/'a sems//
gcig bskyed pas khri'i gyis non par rig par bya ste/ ji ltar mching bu'i nor bu de dag nor bu ni bo bzhurlagacig gis khri'i gyis gnon cing lam mer ma gyur pa ba zhin no// tshe dang ldan pa
gang dag na yang gal te byang chub sems dpas mtshan rnams 'dod cing spyan rasbyin na/ spyod yulam yin pa la spyod dgo/ gang de'i spyod yulum yin pa thams cad ni 'chal pa'i tshul//
khrims tshan par rig par bya'o/ tshodang ldan pa gang dbyang chub sems dpas na tshan rnams 'dod pas sbyin ra sbyin par mi bya'o/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dod pas sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o//
de ci'i phyi'i zhen/ gangal thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod pa de la nimtshan nams dodo// de la ni mi 'jigaso pa rnams yod do// de la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco ra rgyar rnams yod
bas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar du yod de/ de ltar na de'i sbyin pa ni mchog tu bzung ba ma yin no// gang gi tshe mchog tu ma bzung ba de tsho/ tshul khrims kyis rol tu phyin pa//

yongs su 'dzin no// smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwati'i khu byung chub sems dang/ 'a gang thanas cad mkhyen pa 'di 'dod pas sbyin pa sbyin par byed na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mchog tu 'dzin
pa ma yin nam/ gang dang gang la mchog tu 'dzin pa de nyide de'i tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa mnano// smras lo/ tshe dang ldan pa gad po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'di ni yul
na gnas pa bam/ phyogasan gnas pa ma yin no// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid da din gakhrugs sam/ tshor ba ban/ 'du shes sam/ du byed rnams sam/ rnam par shes pa yang ma
yin no// 'dus byas kyang su yin go/ 'dus ma byas pa'i ng ma yin/ tshad yod pa'i ng ma yin te/ de ni mchog tu bzung bar mnus so// chos gang yang dmags su med/
de gang dmigs su med pa de ni yod pa'i ng ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin te/ gang yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma 'dren pa ni chog tu bzung bar mi nus so// tshe dang ldan pa gang
pa dalta bas na byang chub sems dang sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin nam/ tshul khrims bsrung zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ngas su bsngo na/ tshul khrims dang/ brtul zhug
mchog tu 'dzin pa ma yin no// gal tA yang tshul khrin sar nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa/ro ngas subasngon/ tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pas yin te/ byang
chub sems dang du byang chub mas dang/'i tshul khrims las nyams pa nano// smras ra// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sa mas/ dpa' de ltar nyamar pa'i bslang bar nus sam/
smras pa// gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du ma byas la/ gal ta ra tshan pa rnams ma mthong na/ phyir yang bslang bar nus so// yang smras r// 'di la tshe dang ldan pa byung skyob/
sems dpa' blanamedar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sumartem byago/ smras pa// ci'i phyir/ smras
pa/ nyan thos kyi sa 'an/ rang sangs rgyas kyisar ltad bar 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pan thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i
ska la ba med pa'i phyir ro// galata re chos nub par gyur pa 'tshi/ byung nanaThams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob rar rad byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'gyura'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po rgyu'/
kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying pa'i 'dug par ma gyur gyi bod du yang dag pa'i mkha' mngon sum du byur ma gnang go/ tshe dang ldan pa gang rogazhanayang gal te byang chub sems
dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad la phan gdugs dang phyi'i gden par sgrub na/ byung chub sems drapa' tshul khrims kyi re 'ong tu phyin pa/
angs su 'dzin pa su yin no// tshe dang ldan pa bgang pa gzhan yang gal takhyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen rapo tshad yod pa rnams kyi ched du sbyin pa sbyin nam/ tshul khrims bsrung na/
tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yodas su 'dzan pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyi'i zhan/ tshul khrims kyi ra rol tu phyin panAtshod yod da ma An pa'i phyir ro// smras pa// byang chub sems
dpa'i byang chub sems dapa' tshul khrims gang yin/ smras pa// sbyin pa gang dang gangasbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims bsrung ba de thams cad thams cad mkhyen rab nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed na/
'dan byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims sa// gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa la dang klung bye ma snyed du tshul khrims bsgom pa/
phyir spyod2// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngos su mtshon/ tshul khrims kyi ra 'o tu spyan pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma sazhino// gal te nyan thos nyi'i dmaM/ rang sangs rgyas nyid du yang yongs
su masngon/ de ltar na yang tshul khrims kyis rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin te/ des tshul khrims 'chal par yang mi brtsi'o// gal te nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
rtsa kyi sar yongs su bsngon/ de tsam gyis na de tshul khrims 'chal pa zhes bya ba'o// datsa'i phyi'i zhin/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyi'i ro// smras po// tshe

dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i dpyang chub sems dpa'i spyod yu 'di la/da yin/ smras pa// 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dwang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed ra rnams te/ 'dra ni
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod yul la// ga' to byang chub sems dpa' bskul pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma su da dukhyig na gnas te/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lha rnams la bstan tsad
longs spyod la/ nyan thos kyi sa 'a// rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang sems ma skyed na/ datsam son byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims 'cha'ar pa zhes mi brjod do/ daci'i phyir zhe na/
de ltar 'dis 'du lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa da dkrugs ra/'a phyi'o// tshodang ldan dag pa dko dare ran ma'i 'a zhig nyes pa med pa/btson rar bcug ste/
da btson ra ltar lo ma da ra// la brgya phrag mang pa/ 'bum phrag mang por btsonarar bcug la// da'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yang 'khrugs par ma gyur/ des rkyen rangasams kyang ma bskyar
du zin kyang/ da btsonar bcugan/ de tsam gyis ni de rkun pa zhes brjod pa ma yin no// tshodang ldan pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de yang khyim na gnas shing 'dod pa'i yon tan
lnga rnams la longs spyod pa des/ tshul khrims 'chal pa zhes bya bar mi brjod do// gal te bskal ra/gdang krung phyi ma snyed dutshangs par spyad pa spyod la/ dayang nyan thos kyis
ma/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'ongs su bsngo zhing/ thoms cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa yang 'khrugasano/ datsam gyisin da tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes mkhyago/ gang tshul

khrims kyis rol tu phyin pa//rtan thos kyi tshul khrims la sa nas ni/ de byang chub senus dang 'a zhas ma brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni tshul khrinas kyi ra rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal ba'i ri'o//
tshul khrims kyi red rol tu phyin pa las le'udang pokatshodang ldan pa gang tsho gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar bskal pa mtha' yas par mtshams sbyard 'bor
bar byas la// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems bskyed de/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa khyams ma'i

du gang pos// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i du la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i khug la te 'di ltar bskal pa 'di snyed kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid theb da/ra bya'o zhes
tshad nges par byed par gyur na/ 'di la nyes pa ci yod/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang re 'dis byang chub sems dpa' gang yakhor da sa skyagacing rangs te/ da nangs pas dge ba'i rtsa ba
mngos su smin par ang tshad yod pa 'di du'agyur te/ don rkyen thesakyi thag pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gnyis su 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/ tshad yod pas sems can tshad med pa/
rnams kyi don bya bar mi nus// tshe dang ldan pa gang de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad med grangs med pa na// sbyin pa'i rol tu phyin pa ni thoms cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa ma gtogs dar

mngos su rdzogs par 'gyur ba med do// gal tang skul pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dusbyin da/'a ra rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang/ da dung sbyin pa'i pa rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma 'gyur te//

mtha' u0f00sa pa'i phyiren/ de'atsho thams cad mkhyen pa nyidithob por 'gyur ro// tsho dang ldan pa gang ratsho de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' glan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mgo par
rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa// ji lta jilta gAn tu rang re'i mtshams sbyar zhing 'khor ba de lta de ltar sman pa na re de'o tu phyin pa 'phelagag par yongs su sgoms par 'gyur// tshe dang ldan/
da gang pa dben snodags pa sman gyi khu bab chus bkang ste bzhuganA/ ji lta ji ltar bzhag pa de lta de ltar shani tu bsgos pa dang/ shAretu sra bar 'agyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa gang/
bzhin du byang chub sems dang/ ba sems dpa' chen pa yang ji lta jiltar shitu yun ring por mtshams sbyor zhing 'khor ba de lta de ltar sbyin pa'i darol tu phyin pa legs par bsgoms shing/ chos
brtan par 'gyur btang/ ljod bzod par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan da gang dpe na bum pa gsar pa'i nang du mararam/ til mar bzhag na/ de ji lta ji ltar shin tu yun ring du bzhag pa de/
lta de ltar bum pa de snum dang ldan par 'gyur te/ bum pa ni snum gyis khyab par ma gyur dad cung zad kyang med do// tshe dang ldan pa gang da de bzhin du byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen ra lad
lta ji ltar shin tu yun ring po'i mtshams sbyor zhing/ 'khor ba ni lta de ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos rnams dang srid du thob par 'gyur go/ ji lta jiltar sangs rgyus rnams dang

'phags pa nyan thos rnams dang phrad pa thob pa de ltatiltan pa'o ratu phyin pa sa sa// ji lta ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa thos pa de lta de ltar snga rol tu phyin pa bsgom mo// ji lta ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa/
bsnyen pa de lta de lta thams cad mkhyen ra de dang nye bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa gang pa ji lta driltar byang chub sems dar/sems dar/'a chen po sems gang dang gang bskyed/
da de thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa/ bskyed de/ sa mas gzhan dag bskyed pa' gi skabs mi 'byed do// gang gi sems gzhan bskyed pa'i go skabs marAd pa de'i/ byang chub sems/

dpub sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams kyis sems kyi rgyud yongs su bsgos pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang ra dang ran mar gyi bum pa ni gang dang gang nas bzung yang/ rdo

dang dmar gyi dri dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dang ba sems dpa' chen dang sems gang dang gang skye ba de dag thams cad kyang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa nyid skye bar

'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la ni bdud sdig can gyis grags btsal kyang zla grags ma snyad de/ dad dam gas pa gang las grags tshol ba'i dam be gas ra da thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du

sgom par byed pa'i phyir ta 2 de bzhin du bdud kyi ris rnams kyis grub sa ma red do// tshe dang ldan pa gang rar ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar shin tuunaring por mtshams

sbyor ba de lta de ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos rnams dang phrad pa thob par 'gyur ro// ji lta ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos rnams dang phrad pa/ra thob pa de lta de ltar

ba 'ol tu phyin pa rnams thos par 'gyur ro// ji lta ji ltar b.rol tu phyin pa rnams gos pa de lta da ltar de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing sgom// jalta ji ltar nan tan byed cing sgom pa de lta de ltar
kham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur go// tshodang ldan pa gang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' na pe la/ tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa na/ thog ma nor sems dang son
las byung ba' chos rnams 'byung ba/ tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur ba// de nas ra'i 'og cusal// tshul khrims nang bag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ de ltar yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas/
sems bskyed pa dadag thums cad mkhyen pa nyide du yongs su bsngo na/ rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo tshul khrims yid dbag par 'dzin du 'jug pa gang yin pa de/ byang chub sems dang sa khrol gyis

non par 'gyur ro// gal te nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag ga gis// byang chub sems dar 'pheg ra ra'i gang zag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lar tu 'doms la gtams pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag tham
cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngan/ nyan thos kyi thig pa rang gar brag la 'doms pa de/ byang chub sems dpas zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ dpa' phyir zhen/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa gang bo dare gnam la la gsar gyi mo khyer te 'gran khyer ba gang yAn pa de nyid gsar gyi tshes kha dog dang/ dbyibs dang/ 'od kyis khril gyis non par

khyu// 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa gang de de bzhin du gal te nyan thos gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis byang chub gnas dang ba tshul khrims kyi pha ror tu phyin pa 'a 'domasan/ nyan thos de dag
thams cad byang chub sems dad sa hril gyisan par bgyuno// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phare'o tu yun ranam ra thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs sukhasde da' rero// tshe dang ldan pa gang//

la dper na na zhig gis shel gyi mi deng par thebs te 'gro na/ khyer dag gang yin pa de nyid shel gyi mes kha dog dang/ dbyibs dang/ 'od kyis zla'i gyis non par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa gang pa da bzhin du

stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i ji leg tan gyi khams kyi gang+ga'i klung gang dag 5na pa de dag gi bye ma snyed kyi nyan thos ed ru/ra gyu 'a// de dag byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
phun pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston na/ da das ga thams cad ris// tshul khrims kyi lo re la tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos khril gyis non par 'gyur ro// ji lta ji ltar de dag

'domasapa de lta da ltar nyan thos rnams zil gyis non par 'gyur ro// galatabaskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi khyim snyad du 'dug ste/ nyan thos de dag byang chub sems dpa' la 'doms shing rjes su ston na/ de tsam
du byang chub sems dar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'khogs la/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas/ nyan thos rnams nazil gyis non par 'gyur ro// tshe dang

[ej]ldan pa gang pa dperan gser ni ji lta ji ltar zhu zhing bskolo kha de lta de ltar chos 'od gasal zhing/ ches kha dog bzong da'o 'gyu go/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dod bzhin du ji lta ji ltar nyan thos kyi

theg pa pa'i gang zag gis byang chub sems dang po tshul khrims kyi ba 'a'o tu phyin pa la 'domasang shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyu'o// ji

lta ji ltar tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dadas 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyin du yongs su bsngo bas/ nyan thos kyi thog

da da' gang brag khra'i gyis non par 'gyur// tshor ldan pa gang dpo nAler zhanor bu rin dache'i tshur ni ji lta ji ltar nor bu'i phyi dor mkhan 'chadu ba de lta de ltar chos 'od gas la ba dang/ shin tu'os

su dag par 'gyur ro// de bzhin dutan thos kyi thig pa pa rigs gang zag gis ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi ri ro'otu tsan dal 'don sashing rjes su ston pa da lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul/

khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu yongs stu dag par 'gyur ro// ji lta ji ltar k+shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dar sa ba di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi dar rol tu phyin pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su da sngos da phyir ro// nyan thos rnams khril gyis non par 'gyur// tshe dang ldand gang po dpan ri mo mkhan nam/ na mo mkhan gyi slob ma shin tu 'bas pas/ kha dog
sna lnga'i tshon gyis ji lta ji ltar kha dog dang/ dbyang su sku gzugs 'dri'i tshon dgyes rdzogs par byed cing chon byed ra de lta de ltar yude du dang zhing chags par byed da ra 'gyur
te gang gis gzugs rnams bris pa de nyid kha dog dang/ dbyibs kyis khral gyis non par 'gyur go/ tshe dang ldan pa log pa pa rab zhan du gal te nyan thos dpag tu med ra/sa byang chub sems

dpa' tshul khrims kyi ra ro2tu phyin pa 'a 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur kaM/ da lta de ltar byang chub sen sa
rgyudang san nyan thos rnanas khril gyis gnon cing snang bar byed de/ bdalta ste/ tshul khrims kyi ri rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsdebs/ de dag thams cad zil gyis gnon te/

byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sha rol tu phyin pa ni nyon gcig bzhin du rnam par 'phel lo// de dag ni tshul khrims de tsam 'tsho dang ldan ra yanen// tshe dang ldan pa gang pa dper na ma zhig

gas shing bskyed na/ shing bskyed nas/ dus dus su byi dor byed cing chus branan/ lta ji ltar bya dor byed cing chus bran pa de ltar ltar chu zheng rang ba dang du skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa gang de de bzhin
du gal te nyan thos dar/gtumed pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyis rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston na/ ji lta ji ltar nyan thos daragatu med pa rnams byang chub
sems dpa' la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa'i 'phel go/ ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dar/'i tshul khrims kyi
rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'phel ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems kar/sa 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi parol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sdebs/ nyan thos thams cad brel gyis
gnon cing snang bar byas nas/ tshul khrims kyi re tu phyin pa la gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas/ gang dag
dal 'doms shing rjes su ston pa to ga kyang zil gyis gnon no// tshe dang ldan pa gang ma dang nu ma le la me chung ngu'i nang du/ rtswa dang/ shang dang/ lci ba rnams 'jug na/ de ji lta ji ltar 'jug

pa de lta de ltar de'i rgyu las mi ra mched par 'gyur ro// ji lta ji ltar me de mched pa de lta de ltar me'i phung po dag tu che bar 'gyur te/ des dpag tshad mang ra dang gatshad brgya phrag mang pa dang/
dang gatshad stong phrag mang bo rnams sreg cing snang bar byed do// tshe dang ldan pa gang ma de bzhin du gal te tan thos dpag tu med pas byang chub sems dar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
'doms shing rjes su ston na/ ji lta ji ltar nyan thos dpag tu med pas byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu byon pa la 'dom gangashi rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar/ 'di ltaste/ thams can
mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyi'i/ tshul khrims kyi 'og tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dar 'i snang ba dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// ji lta ji ltar tshul khrim kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa 'a snang ba dpag tu med pa de lta de ltar byang chub samudada' la tshul khrims kyi rol tu phyin pas 'doms pa'i nyan thos gzhan gang yin pa dag gis zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur te/ thams
'tshecad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsdeba' phyi'o// tshodang ldan pa mang po dper na ma zhig gas gsar gyi 'byung khungs nas gser blangs te/ des gsar de blangs nas/ bdag nyid kyang btsongs la//

gsar de yang btsongasan/ des gser de datsongs pa'i don na ches ched yin gyi/ gang gis gser blangs pa'i mo dbazhis zhe ne// tshe dang ldan pa gang 'dod bzhin du ji lta ji ltar nyan thos dpag tu med pa/

da ga gis byang chub sems rar/'a tshul khrims kyi ra rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi se rol tu phyin pa dpag tu med cing ches rin thang mer
rgyur/du 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de la tan thos de dpa/ gis tshul khrims kyis kyang zil gyis non par ma gyur la/ byang chub sems dadas ten thos de dag tshul khrims kyis cu'i gyis
ba gnon par 'gyur te/ 'di lten khams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro// smasar// tshe dang ldan par yar dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa'i m/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
ga pa pa gi gang zag 'don sa gang rjes su ston pa bang gzhi pa de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pas la gyis gnon pan/ byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa
rnams chos rgya chen po dang ldan pa zhin te/ blta ste/ tshul khrims kyi parol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams can mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i// da nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tig tu/
tshe dang ldan pa gang pos bshad pa la mngon par rjes su a'i nAs/ tshe dang ldan pa de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dar chen po rnams ni chos rgya chen po dang ldan pa yin no zhes//
smras sa// tshul khrims kyi rol tu phyin pa las le'u gnyis pa'o/// tshe dang ldan par gyur tAti'i bus/ gzhan yang tshe dang ldan pa khyams ma'i bu gang la la smras pa/
tshe dang ldan pa gang pa 'di la byang chub sems dar ba sems dpa' chen// tshul khrims kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pan/ gal takhyen pa po'i chos 'ga' zhig ya nga nas ga rar rjes su mthong na/
dbyang chub sems dpa'i chos la gnas par 'tshig par bya ba ma Ate/ byang chub sems dpa' chos slang zhing tshul bzhin ma yin pa 'di la byed pas spyod do// de'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa/
yod 'du byed pa gang yin ra ran/ de'i 'chal pa'i tshul khrims zhes bya'o// smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwati'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang byon rad pa'i chos 'ga' yang nang dag/
@#// par rjes sum mthong zhing datshul khrims kyis rol tu phyin pa yang dag par blangasanasa'adugan/ chos bang ba tshul khrims kyi 'og tu phyin par phan 'dogs pa 'am// gnor
rab byed par 'gyur/ smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa gang po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin panachos gang la yong na 'dogs pa 'an/ gnod par byed pa ma yin no/ gal tachos 'ga'
zhig 'a ldan ba dgos pa de// gnod du 'a byed par yang dag par rjes su mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa ba tshul du khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa an par rig pakhyago/ gal te byang chub
sems dang/sa tshul khrims kyi parol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang la yang ston pa 'am/ gnod par 'gyur ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yang rag dar rjes su mthong n byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims
kyi nga ro la tu phyin pa mangs su 'dzin ra ma yin no// byed pa po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste/ tshu'u khunas de yang/

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i ro re/ tshul khrims kyi ra rol tu phyin pa zhes khyu'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang pa ba gzhan yang byang chub sems dang ba sbyin pa gang dang gang yongs su
btang nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du longs su bsngonaM/ byang chub sems dpa 'a tshul khrims dang ldan pa ni par 'a ga par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
tshul khrims gang dang gang bsrud pa de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yangs su bsngon/ byang chub sems dang 'tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang la
gzhan yang byung chub sems dpa' pha rol gyis sbyos sam/ brgyad bkag khyad rung ste/ bzod pa la byed cing/ btson pa ras nga thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngon/ byang chub sems/
dang 'a tshul khrims dang ldan da/ yan par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang pa/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can gzhan dag dang gang zag gzhan rnas ched du rtsol bar byed la//
brtson 'grus de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang da gzhan yang byung chub sems dpa' bsam
gtan gang dang gang bskyed pa de bzhin du/ bsam gtan 'di dag bskyed nas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// rdzu 'phrul des kyang sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa la bajug
cing nas dar bya'ogo de nas snod du gyur par bya'o snyam ste/ sams kyi khyad pa de dag thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nongs su bsngon/ byang chub sems dar/'a tshul khrims dang
ldan pa yin par rig pa khyago/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpar gsar ba gang dang gang la spyodatsango/ phung la mkhas pa bano/ khams la mkhas pa/
'am skye mcher la mkhas pa 'an/ rten cing 'brel par 'byed la mkhas pa 'ag/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas pa bam/ ma tam da nyid du'ang shes
nas/ 'du shes thams cad spyad dag pa'i chos bstan par bya'o snyam ste/ sems pa skyid pa gang yin ra de dag thams cad n khyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngon/ byang chub sems dar ba tshul
khrims dang ldan pa An par ra ra ra bya'o// blo na min pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa rig pa'i byago gal tapyang chub sems dpa' nA rol tu phyin pa drug thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su
bsngo ba byang chub sems dpa' de lan nyan thos gang gses kyang tshul khrims la gyis gnon nus pa gang yang na da do// tshe dang ldan pa/ gad ra gzhan yang ba gal te sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las
kyi gan dang ldan par gyur na/ de dag la tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang pa zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dar/'as mas dang pa bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgyad char yang nye bar mi 'gro
ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'i// tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te sems can thams cad nangon pa/gshes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur na/ de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin/
ra re ni/ thig pa lo dang pa zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang pa bskyed rab tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar ma 'gre ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du ang nye bar mi 'gro'o// tshe dang/
/ ldan pa gang dag zhan yang gal tasems can thams cad khyams pa la gnas par gyur// sAdi rje dang/ dga' kha dang/ btang snyoms la gnas par gyur/ de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin ra dayang
thag pa la dang pa zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang ro bskyed ra'i tshul khrims kyis rgya cher yang nye bar mi 'gro bzhag/ rgyun du yang nye bar mi 'grogo/ tshe dang ldan pa gang//
gzhan yang gal te sems can thamagacad stong pa nyid kyi rjes su thun ra 'a ra zad pa dang ldan pa/ragyur na/ de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni/ theg pa la dang po zhugs pA'i byang chub sems
dar/'a sems dang dolaskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang rdo bar ma dge ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar ma bgro'ago// tshe dang ldan pa gang de/gzhan yang gal te sems can thon sa cad/
mtshan ma med dang rjes su mthun pa 'gazed pa dang ldan par gyur na/ de dag gi tshul khrims ga bas ni ra te ni/ theg pa la dang po zhugag pa'i byang chub sems dang ba sun sa dang po bskyed pa'i
tshul khrims kyi rgya'i char yang 'bar ma'agro ba nas/ rgyud bar du zhung ta bar mi 'gro'o// tshe dang ldan pa gad pa gzhan yang gal ti sems can zams cad smon pa med pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i
bzod pa dang ldan par gyur na/ de dag gi tshul khrims gar zhir/nicig pa la kor la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang pa bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'achar yang nyakhar ma 'gro
[f/ ]@#// ba nas// rgyud bar du yang nye bar A 'gro'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang de kazhan yang gab ta sa mas can thams cad po rgyud ra ra gyur na/ de dag gi tshul khrims la dang in ra da na
theg pa 'aT dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dar/khri sems dang pa bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgyal che ud te bar mi bgro gnas// rgyu'i bol rus nga re bar ma spro ba// de nas tshe dang ldan pa/
byams ma 'a bu gang re sa/ tshe dang ldan pa gyur tu ti'i bu 'a/ da ces smras so// gal te tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ dag sa dra de drig[']929 lu ma dang paNan pa sa tshu 'a

dad la ga phyogs 'ga' zhig 'dri'o// smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa gang dado drasishig dad thos pa'i don brda sprad par bya'o// smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i du ci gzugs brgyud pa yin par 'dod
dan smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa gang da da na ma yin no// smras pa// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byar rnams dang/ rnam dar shes pa brgyad pa yin pa/ra 'dod ran/ smras da// rer ldan
da gang do da ni na yon no// smras pa// de las gzhan rang chos rnams la brgyud dar 'dod dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dpo de ni ma yin no// smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa nga shA ra dwa ti'i

bu 'o na brgyad da de gang yin par 'dod// bdag ga gis tshe dang ldan dngasha ra da ti'i bus bshad pa'i don de ji lta burang shes ra ra bya/ smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa gang ratshos ba danems kyi sa rtam dpa 'di sems

bu[z]/ can thams cad kyis mare shes pa de 2// shes pa gang gis mnyam pa nyid de ma ngon sum du byed pa'i shes pa dag/ bya ba byas par thob pa yin te/ de la brgyad ra ni nang dag par rdzas su ma ma gleng/
ngo// gal ta gnas 'di mAdazhan ni nyan ra 'di shes pa ba de de brtag cing brgal bar med do// smras pa/ 'di skad du brgyud ra ba tshul khrims zang unas/ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi

brgya cher yang te khar ma 'grol nas/ rgyu'i bar du ud te bar mi 'gro'o zhes kyang can / tshe dang ldan pas ra tAti'i bu 'dir sdum dang/ phyin dang/ rtogs su ji ltar mathun par 'gyur/ smras pa// tshe dang
